Title: Cáp Treo Hòn Thơm
Description:
Cáp treo đi Hòn Thơm là điểm cộng trong chuyến đi du lịch Phú Quốc.
Nó là hệ thống cáp treo rất hiện đại.
Giá vé đi và về là 600k cho một khách.
Không gian trong cabin rất sạch sẽ
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trong 16 hoạt động giải trí tại An Thoi

Title: Khu du lịch Fansipan Legend
Description: cảnh rất đẹp hùng vĩ thời tiết nắng đẹp mình đã chụp đc rất nhiều ảnh. một chuyến đi ý nghĩa đến sapa phải đến fansipang
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trong 48 hoạt động giải trí tại Sapa

Title: Ba Na Cable Car
Description: Đã đi cáp treo bà nà rất nhiều lần, từ những ngày đầu mở cửa Bà Nà. Cảm giác đi cáp treo trên không vẫn rất thích.
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trong 106 hoạt động giải trí tại Đà Nẵng

Title: Lotus Train
Description: This was such a great highlight of the holiday. We boarded at Hanoi about 8pm. We were a family of 5 so we booked a 4 and a 2 berth. The cabins were clean and comfortable and there was snacks and breakfast box for the morning. We brought our own noodles for dinner as there was a hot water tap at the end of the corridor. 2 loos snd sink which were spotlessly clean. Complimentary beer, wine and soft drinks. Charging points next to bed. Had a good night sleep and woke up to the beautiful coast line. The whole booking process was very easy and I really would recommend this train service as s great way to travel from the north to central Vietnam.
Rank_of_province: Số 19 trong 306 hoạt động giải trí tại Hà Nội

Title: Tàu Cao Tốc Greenlines
Address: 01A Trần Phú Phường 1, Vũng Tàu 790000 Việt Nam
Description: Đặc biệt, biểu diễn diều nghệ thuật quốc tế diễn ra từ 14h-18h ngày 28/8 là một sự kiện ấn tượng để khép lại Festival, du khách đến với lễ hội được chứng kiến cuộc đua của những con diều đủ màu sắc sặc sỡ. Hoặc được trở về tuổi thơ với trải nghiệm thả diều trên bãi biển.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trong 43 hoạt động giải trí tại Vũng Tàu

Title: Hanoi Transport Service
Description:
Good service
Nhan viên nhiệt tình, thân thien
Khách sạn sạch se, thoáng mát, mat mẹ
Sẽ quay lại vào lần toi
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Da Lat Cable Car - Robin Hill
Address: Phường 3 Đồi Robin, Đà Lạt 670000 Việt Nam
Description:
上到Robin Hill 欖車站，可眺望大叻市景，Tuyen Lam Lake，VND100k / way around 10mins，VND120k / return way
景色怡人，但只是短程，相對其他越南景點收費，我覺得單程是較貴。
Rank_of_province: Số 19 trong 59 hoạt động giải trí tại Đà Lạt

Title: Hang Chau Tourist
Description:
Una pratica soluzione per raggiungere la Cambogia dal sud del Vietnam
Circa 5 ore di navigazione sul Mekong con due soste alle rispettive frontiere per controllo passaporti, tassa e visto ingresso
Alle frontiere ci sono panche e bar per attesa disbrigo formalità e possibilità cambio valute
In battello viene offerto una merenda in sacchetto
Personale disponibile
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trong 20 hoạt động giải trí tại Châu Đốc

Title: Da Nang Car Rental
Address: 86 Trần Văn Du Ngũ Hành Sơn, Đà Nẵng 550000 Việt Nam
Description: Tuyêt vời với tính thần trách nhiệm cao, xe sạch và.tài xế nhiệt tình .cảm ơn công ty đã sắp xếp cho chuyến công tác thành công tốt đẹp
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Booking Car
Address: Số 2 Ngõ 8/19/13 Tổ 1, Phủ Đỗ , Nam Từ Liêm, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description:
I was in communication with two other transport companies before reaching out to Booking Car. They promised me a great experience, but getting actual confirmation was so difficult! These other companies required additional steps in which Booking Car did not. Overall I just did one quick call, they asked me to confirm text the details (which I preferred because the language barrier as an English speaker can be rough at time with Vietnamese) and I was situated!

Paid the driver upon arrival, he was 10 minutes early and I was at the airport early. 10/10 wouldn't call anyone else!
Rank_of_province: Số 27 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Amazing Uncles
Description:
Tôi đã khá lo lắng không biết chuyến xe đi Sapa của mình có được suôn sẻ không, và cuối cùng mọi lo lắng đó đã không còn: chiếc xe solati màu trắng với ghế VIP rộng rãi thực sự làm chuyến đi 5 tiếng của tôi thoải mái.
Khuyên các bạn nên đặt xe sớm khoảng vài tuần là hợp lý nhất trong mùa du lịch hè thu này.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 56 Phương tiện giao thông ở Sapa

Title: Du Hành Xanh
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trong 20 hoạt động giải trí tại Châu Đốc

Description: Mình thuê xe cho gia đình đi Đà Lạt 5 ngày. Tài xế rất thân thiện. Xe rất mới. Sẽ ủng hộ Saigon Transfers lần sau
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hue Transfers
Description: We had a great private transportation with Tommy from Hue to Da Nang. He is a super friendly and knowledgeable guy who speaks very good English. The car was very clean and we were given cold water and snacks. During the trip we stopped at different places and viewpoints. 10/10 I totally recommend!
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: Superdong
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trong 6 hoạt động giải trí tại Rạch Giá

Title: Vietnam Backstreet Tours
Description: Esta es la mejor experiencia de viaje en Hanoi que he tenido. Thanh fue mi guía turístico y tenía mucho conocimiento y sentido del humor. La comida y la bebida son muy sabrosas e higiénicas.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1.653 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Transfer Service
Description:
Một mình đến Hà Nội vào ngày đẹp trời, Hà Nội đẹp lắm, thuê ngay một chiếc xe để được dẫn đi đến những nơi Hà Nội. Quả Hanoi Transfer Service không làm mình thất vọng! Cách làm việc thân thiện, lái xe còn có thể nói tiếng anh và đưa mình đến những điểm Hà Nội tuyệt đẹp và cổ kính như phố cổ Hà Nội, lăng chủ tịch Hồ Chí Minh, v.v.
Đến Hà Nội và trải nghiệm chuyến du lịch 3 ngày tại Hà Nội đáng nhớ ^^
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: The Doppel Mayer Cable Car
Description: Красивый вид. Интересный парк. Мы с друзьями провели там около 3х часов. Очень понравилось. Особенно зип-лайн! Таких впечатлений я давно не испытывал
Rank_of_province: Số 19 trong 43 hoạt động giải trí tại Vũng Tàu

Title: Công ty Cổ Phần Tàu Cao Tốc Vina
Address: 91 Lê Quốc Hưng, phường 12, Quận 4, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
Description: Nothing fast about this trip, I reckon 1 HP outboard against a running tide would go faster. The boat was packed and the air-conditioning unless you were seated under a went was useless. You can't even open a window to breathe fresh air. A novel way to travel but if I had to travel to Ho Chi again I would do it by car. Staff were good and refreshments were available but I won't be making a second trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 91 trong 296 hoạt động giải trí tại Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Da Nang Private Car
Address: 123 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai Str, Đà Nẵng 550000 Việt Nam
Description: Hiệu quả và dễ dàng giải quyết giao thông giữa Sân bay Đà Nẵng và Hội An. Cô Jessica đã rất hữu ích. Dịch vụ xuất sắc. Tốt hơn taxi.
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Bus Express 86
Description: Tôi luôn chọn xe bus 86 mỗi khi cần lên sân bay. Xe luôn đúng giờ, sạch sẽ, rộng rãi. Giá thì không có gì để phàn nàn. Chỉ 35,000vnđ/ vé. Phụ xe nói được tiếng anh và cũng rất nice với khách.
Rank_of_province: Số 41 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoi An Budget Car Rental
Address: 458 Hai Ba Trunng, Hội An 560000 Việt Nam
Description: Bạn bè tôi quyết định lựa chọn Hoi An Budget Car Rental cho chuyến đi Quy Nhơn 3 ngày 2 đêm. Trải nghiệm tuyệt vời từ các món ăn, tận hương dịch vụ với mức giá hợp lý. Được giới thiệu các món ăn ngon. Chắc chắn chúng tôi sẽ giới thiệu bạn bè và sẽ lựa chọn công ty nếu có dịp trải nghiệm lần nữa. Cảm ơn Peter Nguyen !!
Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: VM Cars - The Car You Trust
Description: Amazing driver, who speaks great English and is eager to show you the nicest places. Also a very comfortable car! It was a great choice for the drive from Hué to Hoi An.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Hoi An Transport Service
Description:
Très très bonne compagnie
J ai réserve plusieurs trajets Via mail et Olivier à toujours été très réactifs
Trajet aéroport Hanoi
Hoi an aéroport da nang
Les chauffeurs toujours ponctuels, et prudents
Je recommande à 100%
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Danny Phan Travel
Description: We have been using them for many trips already. They are very serious: never late, good cars, good drivers. Very competitive prices. Recommended.
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Address: Vinasun Tower, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 70000 Việt Nam
Description:
Đi từ công ty bên quận 2 qua đường Hồ Tùng Mậu quận 1 mà nhiu đây tiền
Cố tình chạy vòng vòng để làm tiền khách hàng
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hanoi Airport Transfer
Address: 348 Buoi Street, Ba Dinh District, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description: Thái độ lái xe không tốt. Cáu gắt khi tôi xuống chậm 10p. Bên trong xe vệ sinh không sạch sẽ. Xe khá cũ, lái xe vừa đi vừa nói chuyện điện thoại
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Cát Bà Express
Description: Chuyến tham quan vừa rồi làm mình rất hài lòng về quy cách phục vụ tận tình chu đáo của công ty, dù là một người rất hay đi du lịch nhưng đây là lần đầu t chọn lựa dịch vụ của công ty và đánh giá cũng hơi muộn xíu nhưng thực sự đây là một trải nghiệm khá thú vị với mình
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Private Transfers
Address: Bui Vien street Distict 1, Ho Chi Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description: Cám ơn Lily và team đã sắp xếp một chuyến đi tuyệt vời cho gia đình tôi từ Hà Nội đến thăm Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh!
Rank_of_province: Số 12 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hanoi Car Rentals
Address: 10/30/262B Nguyễn Trãi, Thanh Xuân Trung, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: Sau khi tham khảo nhiều đơn vị cũng cấp dịch vụ lữ hành. Gia đình tôi đã chọn Mr Khắc Anh cung cấp dịch vụ du lịch trọn gói chuyến đi Tràng An Ninh Bình. Cảm nhận của chúng tôi sau khi hoàn thành chuyến đi là hoàn toàn hài lòng. Hướng dẫn chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện. Người hướng dẫn có nhiều kiến thức lịch sử và địa danh. Cảnh quan thiên nhiên rất đẹp, môi trường sạch sẽ... Rất mong được hợp tác trong chuyến đi gần nhất.
Rank_of_province: Số 47 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Rosa Eco Bus
Description: Tôi rất vui khi có chuyến Đi với Cty. Thật sự sự phục vụ nhiệt tình của các bạn làm tôi rất hài lòng. Mọi thứ trên xe đều rất ok
Rank_of_province: Số 29 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoi An Da Nang Private Transfer
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: AZ Transfer Service
Address: 31 Hoàng Như Tiệp, Long Biên Long Bien district, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description: We hebben onze transfers voor onze rondreis Vietnam vooraf via de mail geboekt via AZ transfer. Fijne communicatie en ze waren zeer geduldig met mij gezien ik vaak het schema weer omgooide. Uiteindelijk akkoord gegeven en aanbetaling verliep perfect. Eenmaal in Vietnam aangekomen waren de transfers perfect. Dag voor onze vertrek werd er via whatsapp gecheckt hoe laat ze ons moesten komen ophalen. Chauffeurs waren altijd stip op tijd. Ik zou ze in de toekomst zeker weer boeken! Bedankt AZ voor de goede service!
Rank_of_province: Số 49 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Vietnam Private Car
Description: We had an absolutely seamless experience booking our Private Car and Driver through Vietnam Private car. From the time I was in touch with Bean i knew I had made the right choice. He was constantly checking on us making sure we boarded our flight from singapore , guiding through immigration process by WhatsApp chats I have never been taken care of so well by any travel agency. Our driver Mr. Loc was patiently waiting for us despite the arrival delays and the next 4 days were a breeze. We always had the driver on time waiting for us at the hotel lobby and taking us to all the amazing places around Ho Chi Minh. Since we were a group with two senior citizens and a child this was the most convenient way of exploring the city at your own comfort. The pricing also was quite transparent and reasonable. We felt so safe , pampered and well taken care of and never had to rush through the sightseeings. Highly recommend Vietnam Private Car for anybody wanting to explore Vietnam at their own pace and comfort. You don’t have to worry about a thing.
Rank_of_province: Số 18 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Dora Cruise
Description:
Tôi đã có chuyến đi tuyệt vời trên du thuyền cùng bạn
Ở đây chúng tôi được phục vụ nhiệt tình và rất chu đáo
Đồ ăn ở đây rất ngon
Cảm ơn bạn hiếu rất nhiều ❤️
Rank_of_province: Số 3 trên 83 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vịnh Hạ Long

Title: TOMMY EXCURSIONS TRAVEL
Description:
Tuyệt vời
Hoạt bát
Nhiệt tình
Lanh lẹn.
Ăn ngon.
Trải nghiệm đáng nhớ của một hành trình cùng người yêu.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 556 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hà Nội

Title: VIC SAPA TRAIN
Description:
I'm so glad I read the reviews on Tripadvisor because I would have not otherwise known about Vic Sapa train. From the time booking Mrs Nguyen was impeccable, replying to emails promptly and offering all needed assistance. We chose a VIP cabin for 2 and actually had a very comfortable journey. Sure, the train swings, but you would have that with any company since it's one operator for the entire train. In fact, the swinging motion helped me fall asleep.
The carriage is beautiful on the inside, our cabin was impeccably clean and so was the toilet throughout the entire journey, a huge plus. We also had free snacks and drinks in our cabin. Overall, a great experience, I only wish they would cover other train routes, we would surely book with Vic.
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 56 Phương tiện giao thông ở Sapa

Title: Hue Car Rental
Description: Nhóm của chúng tôi đi thăm quan từ Huế Hội An đặt xe qua đơn vị lữ hành Hue Car Rental. Ông Hải là người trực tiếp điều hành lái xe. Rất tuyệt vời, đây là lần đầu tiên chúng tôi được phục vụ chu đáo, thân thiện và rất chuyên nghiệp. Những điểm dừng chân nổi tiếng của Miền trung Việt Nam như cố đô Huế, vườn quóc gia Bạch Mã, biển Lăng Cô, Bà nà hill, Chùa linh ứng, Non nước... và cuối cúng đặc biệt là phố cổ Hội An. Xe đời mới, sạch bóng, lái xe cực kỳ yên tâm, và thân thiện, vui tính. Chỉ biết nói là tuyệt vời tôi sẽ giới thiệu cho bạn bè đội ngũ ông Hải chủ hãng xe. Thiên đường du lịch là đây... 5 sao!!!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: Ninh Binh Car Rental
Address: 44 Lương Ngọc Quyến, phường Hàng Buồm Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description: Gia đình tôi đi thuê xe công ty đi Hà Giang xem mùa hoa tam giác mạch. Lái xe nhiệt tình am hiểu đường núi, các điểm dừng nghỉ ăn uống rất sạch sẽ. Xin cảm ơn công ty.
Rank_of_province: Số 59 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Family Car For Service
Rank_of_province: Số 13 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: VN CARS SERVICES
Description:
I had a full day trip planned with Ken from Hue to Hoi An with hour final drop been da nang.

He was great and made sure we could cover all our spots and also arranged amazing vegetarian Vietnamese food for us.

Speaks English and is very personable. I would definitely recommend him.
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Asia Pearl Travel - Day Tours
Description: Can't express enough our thanks to our super guide Tony who made up our trip. He was very caring to our parents and very patient to our kid. The trip could not go well without his wonderful work that was the brilliant start of our 12 days with the company.
Rank_of_province: Số 22 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Saigon Waterbus
Address: 10B Tôn Đức Thắng, Phường Bến Nghé, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description: xe buýt nước sài gòn giúp bạn khám phá sài gòn qua góc nhìn từ phía đi tàu thủy, rất tiết kiệm chi phí, cảm giác lạ cho khách du lịch nước ngoài
Rank_of_province: Số 18 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Easy Rider private tour via Hai Van pass from Hue - Da Nang - Hoi An
Description: Đường đi từ Đà Nẵng - Huế trên đèo rất đẹp, không khí mát mẻ trong lành, có nhiều quán ven đường để dừng chân ngắm cảnh. Nếu đi từ sáng sớm, có thể bạn sẽ được ngắm sương mù xuống núi và cảnh bình minh lên từ đường chân trời. Đi buổi tối thì có một chút nguy hiểm nếu bạn gặp phải một số xe lớn, tuy nhiên, cảnh tượng buổi tối nhìn từ hướng đèo Hải vân về thành phố Đà Nẵng thì thực sự rất đẹp, lung linh lay động lòng người. Những ai có ý định du lịch Huế - Đà Nẵng - Hội An thì nên thử trải nghiệm một lần.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Thang's Phong Nha Riders
Address: ĐT20, Vườn quốc gia Phong Nha-Kẻ Bàng 510000 Việt Nam
Description: During our stay Thang not only took us around to the all the great local sights in Phong Nha, he also woke up at 4am to take us to our sleeper bus stop. Truly a great man and guide. Definitely book with him!
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 7 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vườn quốc gia Phong Nha-Kẻ Bàng

Title: Hoi An Private Car
Description: Chúng tôi đặt chuyến bay từ Đà Nẵng đến Huế city qua tour private car và tôi cảm thấy đây là một chuyến đi tuyệt vời khi các dịch vụ ở đây đều tuyêt vời, dịch vụ ở đây rất chuyên nghiệp và tuyệt vời khi chúng tôi đã được đi qua các địa điểm nổi tiếng như Lăng Cô, Đại Nội Huế, dịch vụ ở đó rất tốt. Title: Hanoi Airport Transfer Company
Address: 2nd floor,14 Phung Hung st. Ha Noi, Hà Nội 1000000 Việt Nam
Description:
I recently used Hanoi Airport Transfer Company for my travel needs on recent holiday. I found the entire experience very professional and safe. The office staff spoke fluent English and answered my calls on time every time. The quality of cars used are fantastic, clean and new. The drivers I had spoke varying degrees of English but enough to have a pleasant conversation.
I was picked up at Hanoi Airport on time and met with my sign, this took a lot of pressure off me. After a pleasant trip to my hotel I used their services 3 more times. I was taken to Ninh Binh and later on to Halong Bay. The drivers were always ready for me and their level of safe driving was a breath of fresh air. I spoke to the office staff a few times and they were very easy to deal with. The pricing is very favourable considering the hassle is taken away from using public transport. I highly recommend Hanoi Airport Transfer Company.
Rank_of_province: Số 42 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Tour From Hue
Description: We had a brilliant day trip with Lu! He was really knowledgeable and good fun during the day! The stops were great and we particularly loved the stop at the waterfall! Lunch is really nice and plenty of water is provided. Lu also got us a sugarcane drink which was a nice touch. There was bad rain during our trip and Lu really quickly got our bags covered and provided rain ponchos. Definitely recommend!
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Thoroughly recommend this bus service.

Title: Hura Cars
Description:
Mình đi tour không có dự tính trước, ra đến sân bay mới nhớ cần xe đón từ Sân bay Phú Bài về trung tâm Huế. Chỉ cần gọi trước cho nhà xe, khi cất cánh đã nhận được điện thoại của bác tài đón.
Mọi dịch vụ rất nhanh chóng, từ xác thực booking đến dịch vụ khác như tham quan các điểm ở huế, các bạn đều xử lý rất nhanh.
Cảm ơn bác tài tư vấn rất nhiều điểm ăn chơi địa ở Huế rất rẻ, rất ngon, đúng chất của Huế mà mình không thể tìm bất kì thông tin nào trên các trang web khác (đa số được quảng cáo)
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Cảm ơn đã giúp chúng tôi có một chuyến đi rất tuyệt vời tại thành phố đáng sống Da Nang va Hội An xinh đẹp.

Title: Vietnam Top Travel
Description:
Chúng tôi đã có 1 ngày thật tuyệt vời.
Chuyến tour bắt đầu từ 8 giờ sáng và đồng hành cùng hướng dẫn viên rất vui vẻ, am hiểu kiến thức văn hoá, lịch sử. Anh ấy giúp chúng tôi rất nhiều trong quá trình đi tour.
Lái xe rất vui vẻ và xe sạch sẽ.
Nhà hàng rất nhiều món ăn và hợp khẩu vị chúng tôi.
Đoàn chúng tôi thích nhất là đi đò tại Tràng An, phong cảnh rất đẹp và mát mẻ.
Chúng tôi khuyên bạn nên chọn dịch vụ tour này.
Rank_of_province: Số 6 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Ha Noi Tours Booking

Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Asia Transport
Description: Tôi đi xe hãng mấy lần. Nhưng 2 lần ra sự cố với lái xe trung chuyển tại Hà Nội. 1 lần 2 xe trung chuyển đều kêu k nhận được địa chỉ của tôi yêu cầu về trên hệ thống nên nhất quyết không đưa về. Gọi tổng đài vâng dạ nhưng không giải quyết. Lần 2 tôi trao đổi với lái xe trung chuyển sđt 0987361118 đón tôi tại trc cổng do tôi nhiều đồ và lí do sức khỏe k đi sang bên đường đối diện chờ xe đc. Lái xe đã đồng ý nhưng lái xe đến đón thì "dỗi" bảo tôi "anh có 1 tý đồ thế kia mà kêu nhiều" và nhất quyết đuổi tôi k cho lên xe và nói tôi mặt dày. Tôi đã góp ý lên tổng đài và từ bây giờ tôi và gia đình không sử dụng dịch vụ của hãng nữa. Nếu hãng không muốn mất khách quen thì nên tiếp thu ý kiến và xử lí những trường hợp như vậy.
Rank_of_province: Số 90 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hue Friendly Cars
Description:
La experiencia ha sido increible. Fueron puntuales con respecto a la hora y a partir de ahi todo fue una maravilla. Fuimos parando en los diferentes puntos de la ruta conforme lo marcado (nosotros cogimos la opción 3). Tienen agua fría disponible en todo momento y temperatura al gusto en el coche.
Una vez llegamos a Ba Na Hills nos dejaron alli todo el tiempo que necesitamos y al salir nos estaban esperando.
A parte nos llevaron a comer a un sitio de comida local que estaba increíble y a parte baratísima.
Una ruta que se estimaba en 4 horas duró 6 horas y no pusieron problemas, solo querían que disfrutaras.
Lo recomiendo sin lugar a duda!
Rank_of_province: Số 8 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: Same Same But Better Transport and Tours

Description:
This is one the best and most reliable car services in Vietnam, specially in Hoi An. They less expensive than grab and surly much faster and better service. They always show up on time specially in difficult situations. Clean cars and courteous drivers. We have been using their service for long time for our Yoga Studio Om Factory Hoi An.
I highly recommend them for all kind of trips, short and long.

Title: Green Bus Sapa
Address: 618 Điện Biên Phủ, Sapa 330000 Việt Nam
Description:
* Xe đi rất êm, ngay cả người dễ say xe cũng không cảm thấy gì
Tâm lý khá sợ đi xe đêm, lại đi đường đèo như Sapa - Hà Nôi, mình khá lo cũng khá sợ nhưng may là đi xe Green Bus rất êm nên cả đêm mình yên tâm ngủ trên xem mà không lo lắng bất kỳ điều gì.
* Nhân viên thân thiện, nhiệt tình hướng dẫn từng chi tiết
Mình đã đi nhiều hãng xe nhưng riêng Green Bus thì mình thấy nhân viên rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình. Hướng dẫn viên rất thạo giao tiếp tiếng anh nên có thể hướng dẫn cả khách nước ngoài cũng như khách Việt.
Trước khi đặt xe còn hỏi mình có say xe không để xếp chỗ cho thoải mái, Riêng việc này thôi đã thấy rất hài lòng.
* Xe siêu sạch
Mình chưa thấy xe nào sạch như Green Bus. Khách lên xe hướng dẫn tháo giày đi dép để giữ sàn xe sạch, những người nằm tầng 1 như mình cảm thấy rất yên tâm. Xe còn chuẩn bị nước cho từng người trong suốt quá trình di chuyển.
* Nói chung nhờ Green Bus mà mình thấy yên tâm hơn trong suốt chuyến đi. Nếu có dịp quay lại Sapa lần nữa chắc chắn mình vẫn chọn Green Bus.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 56 Phương tiện giao thông ở Sapa

Title: Hue Private Transfers
Description:
Lên xe di chuyển về sân bay Phú Bài, điều đầu tiên mình vui đó chính là nụ cười của bác tài. Thân thiện hết chỗ chê! Bác giới thiệu về Huế, có rất nhiều điểm lạ mà mình còn không biết, mặc dù mình là người Huế haha.
Mình cảm thấy thuê 1 chiếc xe Private là quá ổn, bởi không gian rộng rãi và wifi, khăn ướt, nước đều free và giá cả vẫn phù hợp. Nếu có di chuyển đi đâu, mình sẽ chọn Hue Private Transfers!

Lần nào đến Đà Nẵng và có nhu cầu đi Hội An tôi cũng lựa chọn xe này. Tuy nhiên để thuận tiện, bạn nên liên hệ đặt xe trước 1 ngày nhé!

@Không hiểu sao chị chủ đăng ký tripadvisor mà nó lại sang bên Vận chuyển nên đăng ký lại cho chị cái này.

Đối với những bạn thích khám phá mình nghĩ các bạn nên đi bộ đến động Kho Mường để có những bức ảnh để đời( nên mang theo máy ảnh). Love.

Title: Danang Cheap Taxi
Description: We used Danang Cheap taxi and they were great. Via email while at home, we communicated with Sunny and booked them. No need to pay upfront. You pay driver at the end in either USD or VND. We were picked up from our hotel in Danang. Our driver was Quang. He was on time and so nice and friendly. He picked us up in a nice SUV (pleasant surprise) and loaded all of our luggage. We then went to Banahills to see the golden bridge. We were given no time limit, just told to call him via WhatsApp before we were ready to come down the cable car. We probably stayed at banahills about 5 hours and Quang waited for us in the parking lot the entire time because the suv was parked in the same exact place. We were then driven to our hotel in Hoi An. Quang was an awesome driver. Very safe and conscientious of our needs. A couple of days later, Sunny followed up with an email hoping that we were satisfied with them and wishing us a Merry Christmas and a happy new year. Quang even texted us via WhatsApp a couple of days later to wish us a Merry Christmas. At no time did anyone from this company ask us to review them. Very rare for Vietnam as everyone is constantly asking you to review them. I think this is why they don’t have many reviews, but they should be ranked much higher. They truly care about service. This company was great to deal with from the beginning. Sunny always responded quickly to my inquiries. Their price was the cheapest that I could find but in the end they were the most professional. The best driver and car that we had while in Vietnam. I will only use them when I’m back and I highly recommend them.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Hoian Cars
Description:
I booked them for airport transfer to Hoi An hotel, a full-day tour and airport transfer from Danang to airport. The response for each query was fast.

They sent a 16 seater van to pick 5 of us up from airport. The van was clean and looks new. The following morning, Mr Nhan Huynh personally greeted us at our Hoi An hotel before we left for the tour and bought us delicious custard cream puffs and mineral water.

We needed to get some cashew nuts before we headed to airport and he obliged by making a quick stop at Han market. We made payment at the end of each trip.

Highly recommend them.

Title: Dịch Vụ Vận Chuyển SATSCO
Description:
Ngoài những dịch vụ chuyên dụng trong lãnh vực du lịch hay sân bay ....... CTy Vận tải Hàng Không miền Nam (SATSCO) còn kinh doanh các dịch vụ đặc thù khác liên quan đến vận tải mang tính hiệu quả cao, đem lại cho người dân TP, du khách trong nước và ngoại quốc sự đi lại thuận tiện, thoải mái nhất. Trong suốt một năm qua, Cty SATSCO đã nghiên cứu, tìm hiểu và nắm bắt được nhu cầu thiết thực của hành khách đường bộ, để cho ra đời một số lộ trình xe buýt màu vàng chuyên biệt như : Xe buýt chất lượng cao 109, Xe buýt 159 tuyến đường sân bay TSN - Bến xe miền Đông - BX An Sương - TSN, Xe buýt 119 đi từ sân bay TSN - BX miền Tây (Tất cả đồng giá 20K/vé), và đáng kể là Xe buýt nhanh "Shuttle Bus" mang số lộ trình 49, vừa đưa khách đi tham quan vừa đón khách từ sân bay TSN vào trung tâm TP hoặc ngược lại, xe lăn bánh trên các con đường lớn như : Trường Sơn - Hoàng Văn Thụ - Nguyễn Văn Trỗi - NKKN - Lê Duẩn - Phạm Ngũ Lão - Lê Lai ........đến tận sảnh một vài KS lớn của TP, ngoài ra xe buýt nhanh 49 này còn dừng đỗ tại 2 địa điểm Nhà thờ Đức Bà và Nhà hát TP để cho khách du lịch tham quan.
Ngay khi loại hình xe buýt nhanh "Shuttle Bus" 49 vừa được khai trương cách đây một năm, chúng tôi đã thử đi trải nghiệm và cảm nhân xe lộ trình 49 Shuttle Bus (30 chỗ ngồi của Hàn Quốc) rất đẹp, tiện nghi, an toàn cho hành khách với đầy đủ trang thiết bị hiện đại, hệ thống Wifi miễn phí, đội ngũ NV phục vụ vui vẻ, lịch sự và khả năng giao tiếp ngoại ngữ cao, giá vé lại phù hợp là 40K/vé.... đáp ứng trọn vẹn nhu cầu đi lại, tham quan cho mọi người, nhất là khách du lịch trong ngoài nước.

Title: Shuttle Bus Hanoi - Ba Be
Description:
Ba Be Lake - Private Tour to Ban Gioc Waterfall 3 Days 2 Nights - betwin4d - lazadaslot - Variototo4d

The Experience Awaiting You
Visit: Hanoi Cycling Trip, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam

Day 1:

Hanoi - Thai Nguyen - Cao Bang (L, D)

7.30 - 8:00 Pick up from your hotel in Hanoi for drive on highway No3. You'll also visit the Vietnam Ethnic Group Culture Museum in Thailand's Nguyen City where you can browse objects, photos and exhibits that give you a better understanding of the various ethnic groups and their agricultural tools, crafts and traditional costumes worn for worship. . There will be a stop for lunch before your transfer north to Cao Bang through a scattering of villages and rice fields. You will get a chance to stop at a village known for its tobacco production (depending on the growing season). It is a road less traveled offering you enjoy the scenery in peace. Tonight, you have dinner and spend the night at the Nung family homestay in Quang Uyen.

Day 2:

Cao Bang - Ban Gioc Waterfall - Ba Be Lake (B, L, D)

After breakfast at the homestay, you will depart for Trung Khanh which is located on the border with China. Here you will have the opportunity to meet the Nung people in the village of Phuoc Sen, a mountain village known for its traditional blacksmith craft. The farming tools made here are an integral part of the lifestyle that is evident in the rice fields and surrounding fields. Nestled amongst these breathtaking views is the stunning Ban Gioc Waterfall that stretches over 300 meters, half in Vietnam and half in China. You'll have time to soak up the waterfall's powerful atmosphere and take some fantastic photos before heading to another natural wonder, Nguom Ngao Caves. This cave stretches 2,144 meters underground and is full of incredible stalactites and stalagmites. You will then make your way back to Cao Bang town and descend by snake to Ba Be Lake, tonight you will spend the night in the traditional house of the Tay ethnic family. At the homestay, you can relax and unwind from the day and enjoy a meal of home cooked local food.

Day 03:

Ba Be Lake - Hanoi (B, L)

You can relax on the boat, do some wildlife watching or if you need to cool off you can jump into the cool, clean water for a refreshing swim! As you float on Ba Be Lake, you can enjoy the view of the surrounding karst which is dotted with bits of wild vegetation and inhabited by all kinds of interesting creatures. Take a boat ride along the Nang River, with time to explore the stunning Ba Be Lake, the Puong Grotto caves where you can explore the stalactites and stalagmites that are the result of river erosion in the karst as well as find your way out. bat colony several thousand strong. You will depart for the return trip to Hanoi, a drive of about 150 miles (230 kilometers). We will stop at several hill tea factories before returning to your hotel in the bustling city of Hanoi.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 1 Phương tiện giao thông ở Vườn quốc gia Ba Bể

Title: Hoi An Safari Tour
Description:
Arrived early thinking its was going to be busy. There must of been 30 guests max in the place, so it felt like our own park. The weather was hit and miss but it's a little rain, we can cope with that coming from the UK. One of the show was beautiful, I cried at one performance, it was breathtaking. The safari sealed the deal for us as we always go to zoo's/safaris if where ever we go. Up close and personal with the Elephants and Giraffes was amazing, cost 30000vnd to feed them, what an experience, we loved it. The bird house was great too, cheeky little birds landing on you as you feed them.
The only negative comment we have is the amusement/fairground was closed apart from a couple of rides,no rollercoasters running :-( We never went to the water park due to the weather but I could imagine it being great when it's a hot day.
Cost 550000dng we pay a lot more back home, so well worth it.
Rank_of_province: Số 46 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Er hat uns auch auf kleinere Wege abseits der Hauptstraße geführt, wo wir komplett alleine eindrucksvolle Aussichten genießen konnten. Die Driver waren auch sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend, wir haben uns immer gut aufgehoben gefühlt und tolle Abende verbracht. Die Unterkünfte, das Essen und die Ausrüstung waren perfekt. Title: boutiquehaspa
Description: Tôi rất ít khi đi mát xa . Haizzz . Dc ông bạn chỉ tới cơ sở mát xa này. Thực ra bản thân không thích mát xa. Chỉ thích tập gym, nên hum trước vừa tập gym xong mêt mỏi, đau ê ẩm dc ông bạn rủ đi. Thì đồng ý thui. Vào cơ sở dc gặp Mr Trung , a ta rất vui tính , khi vào nên gọi a ta là handsome man. . Dc a tư vấn với strong massage để giãn cơ và giúp cơ bắp dc kéo căng giải phóng dc các đám rối ở cơ bắp hay nút thắt do tập luyện. Nghe vậy thui, đã thích tai rui. Khi làm mới biết thế nào là massage chuyên nghiệp. Đi các đường cơ rất tốt, bấm huyệt rất chuẩn. Haha. M là hlv gym nên đánh giá kỹ thuật và lực rất tốt. Nhân viên thân thiện, m là ng bắc nghe gái nam đã thấy kết rùi. Tui đánh giá rất cao cơ sở này. Hãy trải nghiệm và cảm nhận nhé. Thank Handsome Man Mr Trung rất nhiều và các bạn nhân viên tại cơ sở Boutiquehaspa.
Rank_of_province: Số 10 trên 54 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đảo Phú Quốc

Title: TIMELINE TRAVEL
Description: Tuyệt vời. Chúng tôi đã đến và trải nghiệm dịch vụ của các bạn. Bạn rất nhiệt tình . Hy vọng lần tới sẽ quay lại và dùng dịch vụ bên bạn.

Title: Danang Transfer
Description:
DỊCH VỤ THUÊ XE TỐT NHẤT MÀ MÌNH TỪNG TRẢI NGHIỆM TẠI ĐÀ NẴNG
mình ở nước ngoài đợt giữa tháng 5 vừa rồi có đặt xe 4 chỗ để đi trải nghiệm các khu du lịch ở Đà Nẵng. Dịch vụ xe rất chuyên nghiệp, anh tài xế tốt bụng vì mình ko biết chỗ nào ăn ngon, anh chở đi ăn Bún Cá rất ngon luôn.
Cám ơn dịch vụ rất nhiều, lần sau mình quay lại Đà nẵng nhất định sẽ thuê xe ở đây, giá cả phải chăng, xe mới toanh, tài xế rất nhiệt tình, hòa đồng, vui vẻ.
Nhờ dịch vụ bên này mà mình có một chuyến du lịch Đà Nẵng rất tuyệt vời
Rank_of_province: Số 19 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Danang Backstreet Food Tour

Rank_of_province: Số 11 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: MTCarsTravel
Description: We had a great transfer from our hotel in Hoi An to Hue. We stopped at marble mountain, Hai Van Pass and Long beach, he also added in an extra stop to see a working fishing village as we had expressed an interest. An excellent guide who knows around Hue very well.

Rank_of_province: Số 16 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Đà Nẵng Airport Transfer
Description:
Mình bay từ HN vào ĐN tầm 1h chiều. Hôm đó (06/04) thời tiết có nắng nhẹ, khác hẳn so với thời tiết mưa to ở sân bay quốc tế nội bài. Chắc có thể do lúc mình xuống tầm trưa nên ở đây khá yên tĩnh, vắng người. Cũng như bao sân bay khác, nơi đây rộng lớn, khung cảnh đẹp, không khí trong lành. Nhưng có gì đó rất riêng của Đà Nẵng, giọng nói rất hay, thức ăn không quá đắt so với sân bay khác.
Ngày mình về HN, hôm đó (09/04) trời râm, không nắng, cũng không mưa. Mình đến sân bay lúc 9h sáng. Vẫn rất ấn tượng với giọng nói hay, trời mưa lúc sáng sớm nhưng ở đây vẫn rất sạch sẽ. Nói chung là mình yêu Đà Nẵng từ nơi mình đặt chân đầu tiên trên đất này là sân bay Đà Nẵng ❤
Rank_of_province: Số 20 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: WOWTRIP TRAVEL
Description: We took this tour from the Pullman resort in Danang early august and had a great time. Thanks to our guide Rin who was very accommodating and knowledgeable about the different sites we visited. He’s very friendly and also a great photographer. He was able to answer all our questions on the history of Vietnam and life in Vietnam in general as well as give as tips on where to go and what to visit. The tour takes you through some beautiful spots with great views along the way to Hué and of cours to the Citadel in Hué as well as the Thien Mu Pagoda and the Khai Dinh tomb.

Title: Beetrip
Description: My first impression of Tan Son Nhat Airport in Vietnam was that it was very busy and crowded. The airport was bustling with people coming and going, and it was quite overwhelming at first. However, the staff were friendly and helpful, making the experience much more enjoyable. The facilities were modern and clean, with plenty of shops and restaurants to explore. It may have been a bit chaotic.
Rank_of_province: Số 9 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Min's Ha Giang Travel
Description:
- Hà Giang là một trong số điểm đến mà mình chắc chắn sẽ quay lại. Với các thác nước tự nhiên, góc núi rừng và muôn trùng dãy núi này tới dãy núi nọ, sự hoang sơ vẫn còn khắp nơi sẽ mang trải nghiệm cực kỳ thích thú với những bạn thích sự yên tĩnh, thích sự đơn sơ và một chút cảm giác mạnh với các cung đường đèo vào mùa mưa tháng 7.
- Bên Min có tư vấn mình kĩ và cũng sắp xếp giúp mình một anh hướng dẫn viên (private tour không ghép đoàn), anh Phúc rất tận tâm, cùng mình đồng hành và chụp hình rất là nhiều.
- Trên hành trình di chuyển và khi ở khách sạn ở mỗi điểm dừng chân buổi tối, mình được gặp rất nhiều bạn từ đoàn khác, hầu hết là các bạn nước ngoài, rất thân thiện, vui và uống rất nhiều =))) coi như đi một mình mà không giống một mình chút nào.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 49 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Giang

Title: Vietnam Discovery Tours
Description:
Very impressed with the town of Danang in Hoi an province! Cultural unity between Chinese, Japanese and Vietnamese people is astounding.
All these people live in harmony and bring so much beauty to this place together.
Our guide Tom took us around explaining and shopping was good. One can shop till drop.
I will certainly visit this place again and spend more time in Hoi an.

Shobha Pillay

Title: Hue Private Cars
Description:
Elegimos este servicio de traslado por las buenas opiniones de Tripadvisor y realmente acertamos. Nuestro itinerario fue de Hue a Hoi An pasando por los siguientes sitios: Lap An Lagoon, Lang Co Beach, Hai Van Pass y Marble Mountain. Además, añadimos dos visitas antes de salir de Hue que nos habían quedado pendientes: Thien Mu Pagoda y Khai Dinh Tomb.

Todas las paradas merecieron muchísimo la pena y el conductor se esperaba el tiempo que considerásemos en cada lugar. Nos encantó la experiencia. Lo único es que hay que tener en cuenta es que es un conductor, no un guía, por lo que se limita a ayudaros con la compra de entradas, pero no acompaña en las visitas ni da explicaciones. No obstante, estuvo fenomenal.

Muy muy recomendable!!
Rank_of_province: S? 13 trên 107 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Huê?

Title: Hue Travel Cars
Description:
Hien was an absolute delight! He truly made my trip around Central Vietnam so memorable. He was very knowledgeable and provided great information about each site I was visiting before I arrived. His English was very good, which made conversing a breeze.

He was also very courteous, always opening my door for me and walking me to where the ticket line was and speaking with the seller to ensure I paid for what I wanted.

If you want a great, safe and knowledgeable driver, definitely make sure you book Hien when you come to Hue!

Title: InAsiaTrips Travel & DMC
Description:
A very well planned itinerary that saw us make the most of out time in Vietnam. We got to visit many historic attractions with detailed accounts provided by the tour guides well versed in their significance, experience days in the life of locals in different settings, as well as enjoy Vietnam's lovely beaches & tourist offerings.
Oanh Nguyen is an absolute gem, she handled all our queries, concerns & chops & changes to our itinerary with grace & professionalism. She truly cared about us having a wonderful holiday, and went out of her way to ensure that we did. From keeping us informed of everything prior to our holiday despite our time difference, to arranging for our dietary restrictions to be met all the different cities we visited, to keeping in touch with us all the way to the end of the holiday, her magic touch gave us the holiday of a lifetime!

Title: Vietnam Travel Advisory
Description: My family and I are satisfied customers under Stella’s service. We originally booked Rita Cruise for our Halong Bay cruise but they have canceled on us due to the weather and they were not operating on the days we are able to do so. So, I contacted Stella if she knows of a cruise that is operating on those available days we have left before we head home to Singapore. And yes voila, she found the best room at Athena cruise with excellent service. Couldn’t ask for better. I am definitely going to contact her again when I visit Vietnam once again. Thank you for your excellent response Dear Stella. She is prompt and helpful.
Rank_of_province: S? 57 trên 494 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Hà N?i

Title: Danang Driving Tour
Description:
We strongly believe that when we visit a country that we are unfamiliar with, we should engage the service from a qualified company to bring us around. After seeing the positive reviews online, we decided to engage the service from Danang Driving Tour, glad that we have made the right decision. Mr. Tri is a very nice and responsible person, since I first emailed/whatsapp him, he patiently and promptly replied my queries. His driving skill is good, the car is always clean and the aircon is strong too.
While we are at Danang, Mr. Tri, Mr. Nghiem (Brian), the drivers (sorry, I forgot to ask for their names) who picked us to/fro airport, transfer from hotel to hotel are always on time with simling faces. Mr. Nghiem is an experienced guide too, he helped us buy the entrance tickets and brought us to all the interesting locations in Ba Na Hill. With his help, we are able to take the cable car and many nice photos in Ba Na Hill. That has really saved a lot of our time and energy in finding the respective attraction and cable car stations. While we are at My Son Sanctuary, Mr. Tri provides us cold water and constantly advised us to keep hydrated because the weather is very hot outside. While in My Son Sanctuary and Marble mountain, Mr. Nghiem shared with us a lot of information and interesting stories of the places, that had made our trip an meaningful historical trip. We deeply appreciate the help from Mr. Tri and his team, we wish them good health and good luck! If you are also looking for good and qualified private tour agent in Danang, believe me, this is the one, you will not regret!
Rank_of_province: S? 22 trên 215 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? ?a? N??ng

Description: Alex is the best driver, the most accommodating staff with free beer and good fun. Would recommend to everyone that’s planning a trip to ha long bay 10/10 experience

Title: Prestigo Asia
Description: 6 of us, all senior citizens, made this fabulous trip to Cambodia ( 5 days) and Vietnam ( 11 days) through Ms Loan of Vietlong Travels. From the time of our arrival in Siem Reap on 17th Feb, till our departure from Hanoi in the wee hours of 5th March '23, we received friendly, courteous and professional care from the tour guides and vehicle drivers and hotels provided by Vietlong, without ever any intrusion into our privacy. There were a few minor hitches, but soon as we rang up Ms Loan, she sorted it out quickly and smoothly. We travelled from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh to Saigon to Hanoi to Sa Pa to Halong Bay... and saw, felt and enjoyed many exotic and awe inspiring spots of natural beauty and history and culture and fun.... all clean and comfortable with all reasonable facilities and arrangements. Only little problem at times was communicating with our mentors till we got wise and downloaded a translator app. After that it was smooth sailing. We never had a better holiday. In fact we are now planning to go back once more, as we could not cover central Vietnam ( Danang) in our trip. Two suggestions : 1. Carry a translator app in your mobile and 2. Try to stick to the schedule as proposed by Vietlong. When we tried to be wise, and the guides changed the schedule to our wishes, we ended up missing some fun due to time constraints.
Rank_of_province: S? 68 trên 494 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Hà N?i

Title: Mr Binh Tours Hanoi
Description: An absolute amazing Ninh Binh day trip with Mr. Binh. I have done many tours living in South East Asia and Mr. Binh was the best so far. Door to door service, he is energetic, considerate, well spoken and very thoughtful in crafting the day’s activities with you. You can feel his passion when he explains the historical significance of the places you visit. He will adjust the itinerary any way you want it and dial up according to your intensity level. I have paid many multiples of money for this kind of service elsewhere and please don’t ruin your short trip with a big group tour offered by the many hostels/shops on the street. You’ll be packed in large buses and shuttled around to commercialized, touristy spots if you do. Get really rural and local with Mr. Binh!

Title: Maximus Travel Vietnam
Description:
This was fantastic! We were picked up from our hotel as a group of four. None of us had been on a scooter before and we were quite anxious but the drivers were fantastic and we felt entirely safe in spite of the Saigon traffic.
There was a a lead rider/guide and a mechanic with a spare bike in caser of any problems so all eventualities were covered. The food stops were all fantastic including a stop at a venue we would never have found for some local excellent singers.
The drivers and guide were all great and we felt completely unrushed throughout.
This was a great trip - value for money+++

Title: MekongEcoTravel
Description:
We had an amazing time with this guide. We had a 2 days, 1 night tour with a lot of activities. She was attentive to our needs and although we are difficult to satisfy, we had no complaints, everything was perfect. We had a real taste of how life is in Mekong delta, and it was authentic and genuine. All the activities were very nice and interesting, we especially loved the boat trip in small canals, seeing heron birds and also the special secret activity in the evening, it was like a dream ! We learned how to cook the local dishes and could practice cooking it and taste it afterwards and many other really delicious dishes. We also learned about the work in the village, we roamed around in motorbike, visit an not touristic floating market, fish farm, fruit garden,noodle and cocoa factory and many more.
Our room at her house was also very cute and cosy. I strongly recommend booking this tour, we wouldn't want someone else to do it.
We want to thank her and her family again for hosting us and we hope to meet her again soon ???

Title: SSC Viet Nam Travel
Description:
My family and I travelled to Hoi An and Da Nang with SSC Viet Nam Travel recently. Given that we have two young children and elderly, we opted for a private tour with spacious van (flexible schedule). The experience was good including the 3 meals (B, L, D) they prepared.
The hotel accommodations were also exceptional, particularly the Deicacy Hotel in Hoi An. Our tour guide, Nam Ho, was an absolute delight. He was punctual, friendly, and incredibly knowledgeable about the local area. His fluency in English certainly helped us communicate with ease, and my kids absolutely adored him. We also want to give a special shout-out to our agent, Lily, for her kindness and prompt attention to all our requests including helping us make a last-minute change to our itinerary and arrange a visit to the Mikazuki Water Park, replacing Hue City. In short, we had an amazing time with SSC Viet Nam Travel and can't thank them enough for delivering an unforgettable travel experience.
Rank_of_province: S? 33 trên 187 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? H?i An

Title: Saigon Morning Ride
Description:
Riding with Sai Gon Morning Ride recently, they always bring me new and amazing routes, unforgettable memories, new friends who are passionate about cycling to explore Sai Gon!
First, it’s an experience that goes beyond mere relaxation and leisure. I express my gratitude to Saigon Morning Ride for a morning filled with the fragrance of incense and smoke, and for enriching my mind with cultural knowledge "Nine children of the Dragon" that traditional schooling has yet to impart.
Second, extremely exciting and won't disappoint you when joining Sai Gon Morning Ride to explore the traces of filled canals and listen to the early days of Sai Gon's formation and development!
Third, it seems like not everyone in SG knows about these amazing little paths of SG! The bikes were really good, Mr Phuc , Duy and Tai who are extremely knowledgeable and they
took care of all the little things during the trip.

I hope to have the opportunity to meet all of you in the upcoming tours. Thank you for everything! ???

Title: Saigon Motorcycles
Description:
Popped over to the D2 shop to look at the motorcycle clothing, have to say, they have the biggest selection at reasonable prices, a very good shop team, able to speak English and tried hard to accommodate all my needs, they have items up to XXL but for those taller or heavier, you might need to bring in from overseas, but for everyone under that, pop over to the D2 or D7 shops, they will have everything you need.
They also have a number of tour schedules as well as there normal bike rental business, there really is only two worthwhile bike rental companies in VN, one is Saigon Motorcycles the other is Tigit, both have a loyal following because they are both first class in their service to their customers, so to anyone considering coming to Vietnam (or based on Vietnam) use these guys for your needs, don't go the cheapest option.

A huge highlight was the food we had the restaurant we were overwhelmed with a great feast. Everything tasted lovely. 10/10 coming back to the homestay was an absolute blessing. Title: Smart Asia Travel
Description:
My small group of five had a great experience with Smart Asia Travel on a customized tour of Vietnam and Cambodia. Duong handled the booking with detail and care and Tu, Huy?n and Chhiev guided with knowledge, care and enthusiasm. In Vietnam, we explored historic Hanoi, experienced the breathtaking sites of Halong bay including kayaking and cave hiking, immersed ourselves into New Years in Ho Chi Minh City and took in the Mekong Delta by water, on foot and by tuk tuk. And in Cambodia we explored Siem Reap, especially Angkor Wat and Angkor Thom and explored the floating fishing village on Tonle Sap Lake.
All the plans were made by Smart Asia Travel including flights, transfers, hotels and guided excursions.
Smart Asia Travel is first-class and delivered exactly what we requested and more.
Girl Travel Tours highly recommend this local agency and plan to send more groups their way.
Rank_of_province: S? 17 trên 135 Vui ch?i & Gi?i trí ? Hà N?i

Title: 1925 Halong Adventure
Description:
opted for a different experience and got to see the night scene of Halong’s beauties through a night tour with Halong Adventure where we went “fishing” for squids!

went on a local boat, got to see the fishing village and went further out in the dark to catch squids. rods are provided and guide will show you the technique to fish for them

felt kind of like a local fishing and it was nice to just be surrounded by peaceful waters. it was a beautiful experience to see the limestone karsts at night and even got to see the bioluminescent phytoplankton through the waves of the boat!

tours are customisable with the company- can let them know what you have in mind to see/do and they will happily curate accordingly for you

Title: Hue Photo Tours
Description: Super spontan hatte Mr Bean den ganzen Tag Zeit für eine Fototour im näheren Umland von Hue mit mir. Mit seinem Motorroller holte er mich direkt am Hotel ab und wir fuhren kreuz und quer durch Reisfelder, über Brücken, schlenderten durch Märkte, zum Strand und zurück durch die Lagunen. Natürlich ist er mehr ein Tourguide als ein vollausgebildeter Fotograf. Das war aber von Anfang an klar. Er hatte viele hilfreiche Tipps und besonders gut war, dass er die Gegend und die Möglichkeiten zu guten Fotomotiven kannte. Er war super umsichtig, sehr freundlich und machte einfach einen guten Job. Bei einem guten, entspannten Miteinander und dazu noch mit einem der in der Gegend zuhause ist und somit einen guten Zugang zu den Menschen hat, gelingen einfach auch super Bilder. Ich bin sehr zufrieden.

Title: Soleil Doré Travel-Agence de voyage francophone au Vietnam
Description:
L’agence soleil doré nous avait été recommandée par une connaissance et je confirme leur sérieux
Cuc toujours disponible en France comme sur place nous a réalisé une prestation sur mesure en collant au plus près de nos attentes
Elle s’est adaptée à notre budget et le rapport qualité prix est excellent car elle nous a obtenu un tarif que l’on aurait pas eu en passant en direct
Le plus : tous les guides sont francophones et adorables
mention spéciale pour Thu à côté de Sapa chez qui on séjourné : famille en or, repas mieux qu’au restaurant, baignade en rivière en face de chez lui et jardin nature zen
Conclusion : un voyage sans prise de tête où on était attendu partout que ce soit lors des déplacements ou des hôtels tout en gardant notre autonomie
Je recommande les yeux fermés
Hervé

Title: HSG EasyRiders & Motorbikes Ha Giang
Description: What a trip! What an experience! For us the highlight of our Vietnam trip. Driving around freely gazing across the rugged Karst mountains on a semi-automatic motorcycle. Highly recommend to do this trip now as it still is somehow off-the-beaten track and no doubt to do it with Bike Tour Ha Giang. Hieu knows the nicest route and little places, and gives several options for your overnight stay (homestay or guesthouse). He neatly adapts the driving speed for those who are a bit inexperienced (like us). Hieu also promptly and profoundly answers all your questions via e-mail or WhatsApp in very good English. He is also setting up a homestay in Ha Giang, which could be very convenient at the start or end of the trip. Bike Tour Ha Giang is a small but solid family business, therefore no extra middlemen costs, in short the perfect QPR!
Rank_of_province: S? 16 trên 49 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Ha? Giang

Title: Hue City Private Tour and Transfer Services
Description: Peter Bao was a fantastic guide on my half day tour of the tombs in way. He was very informative not only about the history and culture of Hue but also answered my questions about the history of Vietnam. Peter's English was beyond reproach. He was easily understood and more importantly he understood me.He and his car are both legendary.
Rank_of_province: S? 23 trên 107 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Huê?

Title: Asia Trip Deals
Description:
I started my trip with Helen in September 2019, as my daughters' honeymoon was organized by Asia Trip Deals and they were very happy with it. Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos and Thailand were the target and 31 days. I gave the company some ideas on what I would like to see. Over the course of 3 months we organized it almost daily and refined the 4 week trip with Helen. Thanks for her speed and helpful advice. Special thanks for suggesting that I stay in Vietnam until the Lunar New Year. It was wonderful!

An exchange took place in December and Lam took over the organization of the trip and finalized the program. Lam made some very good suggestions for some changes, which also took into account that I'm no longer 20!
Lam met me in Hanoi personally and promised to follow me to the last stop, which was the case.

The hotels were perfect, the transports to the programs, the programs themselves and the guides were perfect. In addition to the "must-see" sightseeing tours, I am pleased to have learned about the lives of ethnicities, markets, and rural people. In particular, I would like to point out that not only the Vietnamese programs succeeded well, but the other 3 countries were also well organized by the trusted companies, especially A&Ftour, Nongnoot, who has always been a fan of my programs in Thailand. I have put these 4 countries in my heart, the cheerful people, the wonderful flowers and the delicious food! Thanks for the organization! It was perfect from the first minute to the last!
A 69 years "young" lady from Hungary
Rank_of_province: S? 101 trên 494 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Hà N?i

Title: Tour Guide in Tay Ninh
Description:
I chose Binh as I was interested in a tour that would take me to a different attraction in Vietnam from normal and let me learn more about the local cultural / religious practices. Do check out Binh's Facebook as he has come up with new tours besides this one - for the tour I chose, I believe he is the only English-speaking tour operator who has an itinerary that combines the Black Virgin Mountain and Cao Dai Holy See in one day!

I had a great tour with Binh, who was happy to answer my questions about local cultures and practices, all while navigating the crazy rush hour drive to and from Ho Chi Minh and the long drive to Tay Ninh. Being a local from Tay Ninh and having grown up in a Cao Dai family, he gave a lot of much needed context to the various places that we visited. Not to mention the food that he got throughout the tour - he was accomodating of my dietary restrictions and gave me a chance to experience some truly local delicacies.

I highly recommend booking a tour with Binh - he is a passionate, knowledgeable tour guide who strives to give his best and the most authentic local experiences, all while charging a fair price for the tour that he gives back to his local community. Wishing Binh all the best for the future!
Rank_of_province: S? 1 trên 3 Ho?t ??ng ngoài tr?i ? Tây Ninh

Title: VIETCAM HOLIDAYS
Description: Don met us when we arrived in Chau Duc off our fast ferry service from Phnom Penh. Very affable and easy to get on with from the start. All through our tour he imparted knowledge and general information and also seemed to enjoy showing us around. Always on time and usually with a ready smile. Also good company. He picked a couple of restaurants out for our evening meal and we were very pleased with them both. I can highly recommend him as either a guide for a few days or a city tour around Ho Chi Minh.

Title: VietMate
Description:
We arrived in Vietnam, (Ho Chi Minh) for our 3 week trip with a loose plan of travelling to Hanoi then working our way back to Ho Chi Minh, We had booked the first two nights accommodation, Internal flights and a Halong Bay Cruise. With nothing else booked we contacted Minh and asked if he could organise tours (Meekong Delta, Chu Chi Tunnels, Ninh Binh, Phong Nha Cave, waterfalls, Ba Na Hills, the Marble Mountain and Hoi an). Minh arranged all accommodation, travel, guides, meals and activities to suit exactly what we wanted to get out of the trip. The highlights of this trip where definitely all the great places we visited and the icing on the cake was the Cyclo ride around Hue with Minh and dinner at Banana Mango. The conclusion of our Vietnam visit was made complete by enjoying lunch with Minh in Danang before flying to Ho Chi Minh to get our flight back home.
Huge thanks to Minh, his family and his team for making our trip Awesome.

Title: HoiAnbyYou
Description:
We were searching for something to eat and quite accidentelly arrived at Lucky's restaurant where he and his family welcomed us very friendly and warmly. He told us that he also offers tours and we booked a very spontaneous trip to a lantern workshop.
The next morning he and his friends picked us up at the homestay and took us first to a silkscreen fabric and then to a small lantern fabric where we also had the opportunity to do some on our own.
The whole tour was very interesting and Lucky and his friends took really good care of us (with fruits and water, yummy)
Some days later he organized a driver to get from Hoi An to My Son. It was a precious experience and we were really happy to get to know him. Nice, friendly and very helpful guy. Thank you so much. ( Also for the honey moon snack :) )
Rank_of_province: S? 29 trên 187 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? H?i An

Title: Vietnam VIP Tours & Private Transfers
Description:
We are Best friends from USA traveling together only for a week, we had decided to go 4 days starting from Saigon to Dalat and did a flight to Danang.

The trip from Saigon up to Central Highland and Dalat was amazing with their guides Mr Sunny and Mr Li who really good took care for whole trip about accomodation, foods, place to see . Can say everything were awesome and we were so happy and enjoyed every minute.

This trip you can be explored all special thing from central highland and historical that haven't to much tourist yet.

They're so great in accommodating good room, good local food and beautiful landscaping.

Thank you so much for great experience for us in Vietnam.
Hope we will do another trip from Dalat to North more days with you.
Would recommend this company to everyone who want to explore Central Highland from Saigon.
Best Regards
From Anna

Title: Pumpkin Tours & Transfers
Description:
Visite de la grotte de Phong Nha et de la grotte du paradis en voiture privée. 

Nous sommes arrivés à la gare de Dong Hoi à 7 h 30, le chauffeur et le guide touristique de Phong Nha Tours &Transfers nous y attendaient.

Ils m'ont offert le petit-déjeuner et le café avant de partir pour une excursion d'une journée. Depuis la gare de Dong Hoi, il nous a fallu environ une heure avant d'atteindre la grotte de Phong Nha.

Nous avons fait le tour de la grotte de Phong Nha en bateau et avons gravi des centaines de marches pour visiter la grotte de Thien Duong.

Nous avons été satisfaits du voyage en raison de sa conduite sûre et prudente, de son guide touristique compétent et sympathique et de sa cuisine délicieuse.

Si vous avez la possibilité de venir à Quang Binh, vous devriez faire cette excursion d'une journée!

Title: Indochina Trends - Asian Tour Operator
Description: Organized by Thuy of Indochina Trends (IT), we covered Hanoi, Halong Bay, Hue, Hoi An, and Ho Chi Minh City in 12 days. She put together a thoughtful itinerary with great guides (notably Long in Hanoi and Nhug in Hue). Unmissable: Hanoi street food, 2D1N Bai Tu Long Bay cruise, Thuy Biey village in Hue, and the Cu Chi tunnels in Ho Chi Minh. When we wanted to change our itinerary in the last minutes, Thuy came back with the amended program in within a day! They didn't put a foot wrong. I strongly recommend IT for their thoughtful planning and excellent services.

Title: Phong Nha Pioneer Travel
Description: Great trip to Phong Nha Cave and Paradise Cave in one day from Dong Hoi. The best tour company in Dong Hoi I would say. The tour was done in a professional way with excellent English tour guide, spotless car with friendly driver. The sites of Phong Nha Cave and Paradise Cave were absolutely amazing. The scenery on the way to Phong Nha cave entrance was marvelous with gorgeous mountain ranges and tranquil landscapes. We thus explored really beautiful caves and grottoes in Phong Nha and the ones in Paradise cave as well. Both caves with magical scenery and it is a truly adventure tour for us. So, we love Phong Nha Cave and Paradise Cave so much and a big thank to Phong Nha Pioneer Travel for a great trip worth value with our money.

Description:

Uyen responded quickly to Any questions or queries we had & put them to rest.
He arrived the day before and wanted to explain how he conducts the tour & summarizes what we want to experience along the way.
Uyen made us feel very comfortable & relaxed with his approach & manor.
And what an Experience this turned into, we can't Praise Uyen enough & this has proven to be a Highlight of our trip.
This Experience introduced us to the local people, the food and the coffee of the regions we traveled through.

We Highly Recommend Uyen as a guide and his experience really Shines through

Title: HIFI Travel
Description: I had the pleasure of joining Hifi Travel's basket boat tour and cooking class, and it exceeded all my expectations! The basket boat tour was a serene and scenic journey, allowing me to soak in the beauty of the surroundings. The guide shared interesting stories about the local culture and history, making the experience even more enriching. Following the basket boat tour, the cooking class was a hands-on experience where I learned authentic Vietnamese recipes. The chef was knowledgeable and patient, ensuring that everyone understood the techniques and flavors. The class ended with a delicious meal that we all prepared together. Hifi Travel offers a well-rounded and enjoyable package for those seeking to explore both nature and culinary delights in Vietnam

Title: Dark Cave Phong Nha Tours
Description: A friend and I came to the cave and spent a hilarious couple of hours getting involved in the sporty and active adventure within the cave. We missed the safety video which in hindsight would have been helpful as we did not know how to successfully stop ourselves as the bottom of the zipline (we both graciously crashed into the mat). We had a lot of fun with our tour guide who helped us get equipped with helmets and torches before we acclimatised to the cold water, swam 10-40m to the cave entrance and hiked in through a muddy pathway. The guide called out when we needed to slow down to get safely through the tunnel. We arrived at a mud bath which was very slippery but the whole group loved getting fully involved in the mud and we had a great laugh all together. If you do not want to get muddy, this trip is NOT for you. Then we went back out for a cold dip and to remove the mud from our bodies and clothing, before kayaking (which was a lot of effort after we had laughed so much) back to the adventure course. This part is optional but we stayed and did a mini zip line, a big dive into the water and a small assault course over the water. A very fun afternoon and well worth the price if you are with a good group of adventurous people!
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Giải trí về đêm ở Son Trach

Title: Pure Vietnam Travel
Description:
Eine wunderschöne zwei tages Bootstour in der Bai Tu Long Bay. Anders als wie bei anderen Booten wurde die Gruppe sehr klein gehalten (8x Pers.) wodurch es mehr als genügend Platz und ruhige Minuten gab. Die Zimmer waren groß, geräumig und sehr sauber. Der Meerblick vom Bett aus war wunderschön. /Frühstück/Essen war sehr gut. Die Kanu Tour war das Highlight, da wir für sehr lange Zeit (geschätzt 30 - 45 min) an den Inseln vorbei gepaddelt sind, ohne eine andere Touristengruppe zu sehen. Auch der Stand zu dem wir gepaddelt sind war fast menschenleer und wunderschön. Als dann der Ansturm auf den Stand kam, waren wir bereits fertig und paddelten zurück. Der Ausflug zur Höhle am zweiten Tag war auch sehenswert, aber sehr touristisch. Eine Gruppe nach der anderen wurde durch die Höhle geschläust. Zusammenfassend war der zweitägige Trip zur Bai Tu Long Bay wunderschön, und wir würden auf jedenfall erneut die Tour buchen. Verglichen zur Ha Long Bay viel weniger touristisch.

Danke auch an Ms. Bac (Pure Vietnam Travel) für die super Beratung. Ohne Sie wären wir sicherlich bei der überfüllten Ha Long Bay gelandet.
Rank_of_province: Số 135 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hoho Travel
Description:
Our guide seemed nice but didn't speak English, so he wasn't able to tell us anything about the places we were at. He took us to a marble factory, which was interesting, but he just dropped us off. He then took us on to Hoi An, which we were looking forward to. When we asked if he could recommend a restaurant, he dropped us off in front of one and just pointed. We would have liked to try the Anthony Bourdain restaurant, but forgot it was an option to ask for and did not have it offered to us.

In the end, we feel like we ended up paying $100s of dollars for a taxi ride to Hoi An and back.

The guide was so friendly, knowledgeale and professional, they told us a lot about local life and floating villages. The kayaking tour was really cool to explore hidden lagoons and beaches and lunch was just amazing with a lot of seafood. This tour agency was recommended to us by friends and we 're so happy to go with them. Excellent value for money and highly appreciated

Title: Mui Ne Go
Description: Arnaque go voyage, Ils vendent des billets bon marché et envoient ensuite un message indiquant que le vol a été annulé. Lorsque on les téléphone , ils disent non, le vol n'a pas été annulé, ne vous inquiétez pas, il n'y a pas de problème et en rajoutant de ne pas raccrocher le téléphone tout de suite, de reponde aux question de satisfaction. Mais la vérité est qu'il n'y a pas d'avion. Personne ne rembourse l'argent. Comme moi plusieurs amie a eu le meme histoire. Chaque année ca nous arrive meme problems.

Title: Saigon DMC Travel
Description:
“Smooth” is the word. We’re a family of four. We spent 17 days in Vietnam. We travelled from Hanoi to Haiphong, Haiphong to Tam Coc, Tam Coc back to Hanoi, journeyed between Hoi An, Da Nang, Hué, and then back to the Hanoi airport. And each journey took place smoothly. The drivers were punctual, friendly and one of them gave us a Vietnamese lesson. Loads of fun.

Price wise, they beat the competition. Most of all, they are trustworthy. There’s was no haggling, no “taking us for a ride” (except the actual ride).

Tuan was our contact and he was super responsive, flexible and helpful.

I strongly recommend Saigon DMC. 👍

Title: HRS Cruise - Huong River Services
Description:
Cám ơn HRS đã giúp tôi mang lại kỷ niệm đẹp và hoàn hảo nhất khi đến với Huế.
Dịch vụ của HRS rất tuyệt vời. Ngắm nhìn thành phố Huế mộng mơ trên thuyền của HRS là một điều rất thú vị. Tất cả cảnh đẹp hai bờ sông Hương được thu lại vào tầm mắt tôi vô cùng hoàn mỹ. Cùng với sự kết hợp tinh tế của ẩm thực nơi đây trong không gian sang trọng, ấm cúng, đầy lãng mạn và tiếp nối chương trình nghệ thuật đặc biệt khiến tâm hồn tôi thư thái và lắng đọng phút chốc thật khó quên. Những trải nghiệm đó làm tôi nhớ và càng yêu Huế nhiều hơn.
Rank_of_province: Số 17 trên 39 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Huế

Title: Tàu cao tốc Cam Việt
Description:
Bruce at Mandarin Cruises helped me arrange a fantastic 5 day custom private charter cruise of the Mekong delta, plus return transport on his ferry service between Phnom Penh and Chau Doc. I can't say enough good things about their service, amazingly personal and responsive to my endless emails and WhatsApp messages.

Vien and the rest of the staff on the ferry were excellent, really friendly professional services. Super easy border crossing. Our party had the ferry to ourselves going down, so very comfortable. Bruce met us at the ferry terminal in Chau Doc and helped to get us set-up with SIM cards for Vietnam, then picked us up in the morning from hotel for a ride back to the dock.

The next morning we set-off for a 5 day charter on one of Mandarin's slow boats. Highly recommend if you're looking for a unique experience for a few days and have a sense of adventure. Very relaxing, just sipping drinks, playing cards and watching the world go by. There are endless small canals and waterways in the area to explore, and plenty of small towns along the way to stop along the way and get a room. Our captain was excellent, very accommodating to our requests. Basically worked like a self-hire boat with pilot, he took us anywhere on Google maps we wanted to go (but be prepared to do some of your own navigating).

These guys are pros and really put in the effort to provide a high standard of service. While everyone else said "no" to my travel plans, these guys went the extra mile to make it special.
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 3 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Châu Đốc

Title: Halu Vietnam Tours
Description:
Good tour good friends and good service

Title: Tour Center Viet Nam
Description: We had to catch a taxi, cost 20,000 Dong, from our Royal MGallery hotel to one of the big van stops about 2 km away. While comfortable, I noticed the van was beginning to age. Please note the 24 seater van could not go through Hoi An Old Town in the evening, so be prepared to walk or catch a taxi to your hotel. The tour guide was very friendly, tried very hard to please with his local and historical knowledge but I could hardly understand some of them, could be due to sitting further back. All places we stopped at were interesting and worthwhile visiting. The total duration was just right.
Rank_of_province: Số 33 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Description: Great transfer from Hoi An to golden bridge 1 day. We booked the private SUV from Allegro Resort Hoi An to Bana Hills and got great service. The driver was punctual and the car was very clean and comfortable. Our driver helped us to buy cable car tickets and offered us complimentary bottled water. Time was very flexible and was more than enough for us to explore Bana Hills attractions for 1 day. I 100% recommend this service.

Title: Ga Long Biên
Address: Trần Nhật Duật, Đồng Xuân, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 10000 Việt Nam
Description:
最近、ハノイ駅ではなく、このロンビエン駅が発着の起点となることが多いようです。実質的に、ハノイ市の中心的な駅のようでもありますが、規模は小さく、窓口の数も少なく、待合室も広くはありません。待合室に、「コンビニエンスストアはこちら」のような掲示があったので行ってみたら、露店のような小さな売店があるだけでした。全体的には、のんびりした雰囲気のある駅で私は嫌いではありません。
待合室に繋がったホームらしきものはありますが、乗車する場合は駅舎を出て、線路に沿ってハノイ駅の方に歩いて行って、汽車を待ちます。一等車（9号車）を予約していた私は、駅から100mほど離れたところで待っていました。
日本ではこんな経験は出来ないので、面白かったです。
Rank_of_province: Số 161 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Phong Nha Private Driver
Description: We drive from Phong Nah Khe Bang to My Son with Cong. Cong - speaking good English - started by proposing to us an interesting sights "on top of" trip itself, namely the border bridge between North and South Vietnam, and provided valuable information about this. He pointed out along the way important crops for the area, and told us about, and answered many of our questions about, daily life in Vietnam for different groups of ordinary Vietnamese, and we could tell a little about our home country Denmark, and got a really rich conversation about especially Vietnam. Cong proposed. interesting routes for the trip, including going "over the mountain" before coming to Da Nang. Cong proposed a good local restaurant for our lunch, and was excellent at asking to and listen to what we wanted, and adapted the trip to this. So our 8 hours drive became an interesting and rich trip with respect to what we saw, and good and cosy conversations during the trip.
Rank_of_province: Số 4 trên 10 Phương tiện giao thông ở Phong Nha

Title: Vietnam Rental Car
Description: We booked a car rental from Vietnam Rental Car for our trip from Hoi An to Hue. It's great that our choice is right. They provided us with a new, luxurious and comfortable car. Minh, our driver, he drives very safely, carefully and professionally. Besides, he can speak basic English, which makes the journey from Hoi An to Hue by private car more interesting. On the way to Hue, he stopped for us to visit tourist attractions such as: The Marble Mountains, Hai Van Pass, Lang Co Beach and Lap An lagoon. He served us very attentively and enthusiastically. The car rental price is completely reasonable, only $75 for my family of 4. The support staff guide us enthusiastically, quickly and conveniently. We will use the car rental service of Vietnam Rental Car on the next trips. Highly recommended!
Rank_of_province: Số 59 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Mozio - Ho Chi Minh

Rank_of_province: Số 59 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Туоператор МИР ТУР
Description: Здравствуйте. Мы с супругом первый раз во Вьетнаме. Как всегда туроператор, который привёз нас, стал навязчиво предлагать свои экскурсии и критиковать, как они говорят, «уличные турагентства». Но мы всё же не побоялись и купили поездку в Далат у туроператора Мир Тур. 11 марта 2020 года с супругом посетили этот красивый город. Экскурсия оказалась просто замечательной!!! Во-первых, хотела бы отметить организацию. Все очень четко, отлаженно, по времени. Побывали в очень многих красивых местах и везде без проблем, загвоздок. Транспорт хороший, водитель - профессионал своего дела. Во-вторых, следует сказать о подборе программы и посещаемых мест. На наш взгляд, мы смогли посетить всё самое лучшее, красивое и интересное. Причём это было без излишней рекламы и навязанного «шопинг». А, в-третьих, отдельно хотелось бы рассказать о гиде Юлие, которая сопровождала нас. Высоко профессиональный, эрудированный, образованный, очень культурный человек. Она на протяжении всей экскурсии 12 часов рассказывала нам о стране, традициях, жизни Вьетнама. Мы узнали очень много интересного, полезного и необычного, что не прочитаешь ни в одном путеводителе. Лично я осталась под впечатлением от увиденного и услышанного. Благодарим туроператора Мир Тур за организацию тура и отдельную благодарность выражаем гиду Юлие за такую замечательную с душой проведённую экскурсию. Через день ездили на морскую прогулку. И снова всё прошло замечательно! Рекомендуем туроператора Мир тур. Наталья и Олег.
Rank_of_province: Số 7 trên 58 Phương tiện giao thông ở Nha Trang

Title: Vietnam Retro Tour
Description:
Our guides were Eric and Henry. They were very attentive, courteous, knowledgable and good fun. They take you round to all the sites in Hanoi, some less well known ones amongst them. We also visited a cafe to have an "egg coffee" this apparently is something they developed due to a shortage of milk in the Vietnam war. It tastes surprisingly very nice.
We were a bit apprehensive when we booked it due to the traffic in Hanoi and us only having a motorbike and sidecar to protect us. But we felt safe the whole time. Its an exhillerating way to see the sites either riding pillion or in the sidecar.
The whole way round Eric was taking photos which he later sends to you on Whatsapp.
So we thoroughly recommend this trip. If you only do one site seeing trip in Hanoi you wont go wrong with this one.
