Title: Best Price Tour Co.ltd
Description: Explorez les beautés sauvages, les cultures enchanteurs et les paysages grandioses du Fansipan Mountain en visitant Sapa Town et le Cat Cat Village! C'est l'expérience la plus intense et la plus personnelle que l'on puisse avoir, car il n'y a pas de mots qui puissent décrire ce magnifique voyage. Une route longue et spectaculaire qui vous guide à travers les collines, les rivières, les montagnes brumeuses et les fermes vertes, vous arriverez à la ville de Sapa qui est connue pour ses couleurs vibrantes, ses cultures variées et ses souvenirs indéniables. Le Cat Cat Village est l'attraction clé de la ville et dans ses ruelles, vous verrez de nombreuses merveilles architecturales et des souvenirs traditionnels qui vous rappelleront cet incroyable voyage. La visite au Fansipan Mountain offre une expérience incomparable, que vous n'oublierez jamais. Alors, partez à Sapa Town et Cat Cat Village au Fansipan Mountain et vivez une aventure inoubliable!

Title: Viet Han Dental Clinic
Description: Хотел бы оставить отзыв и благодарность замечательным сотрудникам этой стоматологической клиники! Попал я сюда по совету своей знакомой, у меня было воспаление после удаления зуба мудрости. Я мучился уже две недели с температурой и постоянными болями, жил только на обезболивающих, не мог ни спать, ни есть. Врач, который удалил мне этот зуб (в другой клинике) говорил, что так и должно быть. А тут с самого порога меня встретили приятные, квалифицированные сотрудники. Сервис и внимательное отношение к пациентам - это то, что ставят на первое место в этой клинике и это очень приятно!Отдельное спасибо девушке администратору по имени Vy, очень внимательная и хорошо говорит по английски. Я заполнил анкету и познакомился с русскоговорящей девушкой-доктором по имени Оань. Я объяснил ей свою проблему. Меня отвели в очень чистый, хорошо оборудованный кабинет, врачи осмотрели место удаления зуба и сказали,что в лунку попали остатки пищи и началось воспаление. Было принято решение сделать чистку и продезинфицировать воспалившиеся место. Все было сделано максимально качественно, аккуратно и безболезненно. Через час после того, как отошла анестезия, я в первый раз за две недели почувствовал настоящее облегчение. После чистки лунка успешно зажила и я уже ходил к Доктору Оань на лечение зубов. Все точно также качественно и безболезненно, также очень радует то, что в этом месте не стараются заработать на тебе как можно больше, а дают объективную оценку для конкретного случая. Для меня это лучшая клиника в Нячанге!!!
Rank_of_province: Số 5 trên 19 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Nha Trang

Title: HAPPY PLUS TRAVEL
Description:
I had a wonderful time visiting the Cu Chi Tunnels and the Mekong Delta with the help of David, who was an excellent planner and organizer. He understood my requirements well and was always available for any kind of query resolution. He arranged the best tour guide one can ask for, Mr Bui, who had deep knowledge on our tours and Saigon culture and always kept the group intact with beautiful stories and history.

I was scared of being asked for tips at random places as I had read about it (especially in Mekong Delta). When I let David know the same, he made sure that we were comfortable everywhere by letting the tour guide know in advance who would then always come up if he saw someone persuading for tips. So we had nothing to worry about on this perspective and this reassurance of not worrying about anything made our trip really mesmerizing.

Our requests for vegetarian food and small group (< 10 pax) were also considered, so the tour guide could focus on us and it was not crowded. Our limousine bus was extremely comfortable, very silent so we got a good amount of time to relax in between and yes not to forget cold water bottle was provided 500 ml each and pickup & drop was exactly from the hotel point. Excellent Hospitality & the pickup and drop services were well informed in advance.

Unlike many tours that are about money, here the focus is solely on hospitality and rich experience. We were given options to pay for the trip whenever we felt the most comfortable with - be it cash or online payment (with no platform charges for international travellers, so we paid exactly what was asked). Along with the bigger things, all the other little things, like proper wait time for restrooms and time for breakfast, were adequately provided for each one of us.

David made our day in HCMC really brighter and I would 101% recommend him to anyone for any kind of trip planning. He is the best planner you can find in HCMC!
Rank_of_province: Số 66 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Imperial Travel
Description:
Dear Imperial Travel: I need your special help to visit my adopted son's village in the remote mountains of North Vietnam.

This message I sent is how it all started. The best day ever. The last day my adopted son saw his birth Mother. The day him, his birth siblings and I climbed the mountain to pray for their dying Mother. And the people who made this possible: Hein and his team at Imperial Travel.

Of course Imperial Travel took care of us in Hanoi. We stayed at the very best hotel, The Imperial Hotel. They took care of an excellent driver and car to take us 3 hours away into the rice/mountain country. Of course they took us to the best local restaurants along the way. Of course they added in other trips to resorts and even an overnight boat cruise to Halong Bay. They do all of that better than anyone else. Of course they do.

But what no one else can do, Imperial Travel will. They will make your trip become the BEST DAY OF YOUR LIFE. (Day, Week, month, whatever.) If you have a special dream, they will make it happen.

My dream - to somehow have my son be able to communicate and bond with his birth family. They don't speak the same language. Hein was an excellent translator, however they needed to bond in another way too. My dream was to climb the giant mountain behind their stilt house. And to have all of us hike up that mountain. Hein embraced my idea and presented it in a way that everyone in the family agreed to come along.

It turns out no foreigner ever hiked that mountain before me. And the people who go up that mountain are doing it for collecting of food, medicine, firewood, etc. Everyone works too hard to have time to go on a "hike" for fun. So this was indeed an unusual happening in this village. And everyone in the village came out to watch us go.

My son and his birth siblings didn't need language to catch cray fish and hunt for our food on the mountain. They bonded and it was things they all really liked to do. My son, when he was little, had a strange passion for catching cray fish. I could never understand it. Now I do.

Sister and I prayed at the tippy top. Her in a Buddah meditation pose and me with my catholic hands folded. We prayed for the dying Birth Mom.

Then we had this amazing meal. They killed and cooked the chicken that the little cousins carried up the mountain. It was the best chicken ever. And they also brought each of us a beer. It tasted so good.

The funny thing was... Guess who turned to me and said:
"This is the Best Day of My Life"

Hein, the owner of Imperial Travel!

It was the Best day of all of our lives - All of us on that mountain that day.

My Next Dream: A bike and hike adventure in North Vietnam with a group of 20 of my friends. Hein has the entire itinerary worked out. We had to postpone our trip due to covid and now we are all trying to coordinate new dates that we can all go.
Rank_of_province: Số 178 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Hanoi Car For Rents

Title: Borderlands Tours
Description: Was one of the greatest tours I did in my life. Speaking with other travelers I realized how different my experience was. While many followed big groups and stopped at the same tourist traps, our itinerary gave us the chance to go through beautiful roads leading to hidden villages on insane valleys or mountain peaks. We even met people whose family has been working on silver jewelry for a hundred years or visit a stunning palace built with money from opium cultivation in the past. We also appreciated to see that the agency works with real ethnic families which live simply but who committed to bring a nice and comfortable experience. Beautiful houses featuring elements related to ethnics past and culture. No words to describe how much we learnt from this area in just 3 days. This is real guidance!
Rank_of_province: Số 25 trên 49 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Giang

Title: Xe du lịch Quảng Bình
Description: Bạn tôi giới thiệu đặt dịch vụ vận chuyển của Xe du lịch Quảng Bình để tham quan động Phong Nha và động Thiên Đường trong một ngày. Trong suốt hành trình từ Đồng Hới lên đến động Phong Nha, bác tài kể cho chúng tôi nghe những câu chuyện thú vị về quê hương bác và mở nhạc hát về Quảng Bình làm cho chúng tôi hiểu hơn và yêu mến hơn mảnh đất và con người nơi đây. Bác tài thực sự vui tính và nhiệt tình giúp đỡ chúng tôi khiến cho chúng tôi có một hành trình khó quên về vùng đất di sản Quảng Bình. Nhất định chúng tôi sẽ quay trở lại vùng đất xinh đẹp này vào một ngày gần đây. Xin thay mặt gia đình, một lần nữa tôi xin cám ơn bác tài rất nhiều vì dịch vụ hoàn hảo.

Title: WOWTRIP TRAVEL
Description: My two sons and I did a combined tour of visiting My Son temples in the morning and the Hoi An Food Tasting and Walking Tour in the afternoon. The tour guide was immensely knowledgeable and made great recommendations of what food to try. My youngest son who can be a rather picky eater at times was even happy. Our tour guide recommended great photo spots and offered to take photos for us so that we would have great memories to look back on with all of us in it. The guide sprinkled just enough history and culture into the conversation to be educational but not boring. He was immensely good with kids and showed genuine concern for our well being in dealing with the heat and humidity which we were not accustomed to. It was a great tour and definitely well worth the money spent.

Title: DUYEN LE THI THAO
Description: What can I say except that she made ho chi Minh city feel alive in a way I couldn't have ever imagined. She really made every location an adventure. This tour was super fan and all of the spots she picked lead themselves to fun adventures where I could try the local cuisine. The rides in-between the restaurants and locals were also very safe and she is a great driver. She also did a great job explaining the food and the importance it has in he culture and never made me feel bad about my chopstick skills haha. Her English was also at a level that I felt I never had to explain my self too many times. She also was very good at anticipating my needs. I will definitely use her services again! I would also recommend anyone who is traveling solo to look at this tour as a great opportunity to explore one of Vietnam's biggest city ho chi Minh city.
Rank_of_province: Số 45 trên 159 Vui chơi & Giải trí ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Hoian & Vicinity Tours
Description:
Cinq étoiles pour un service parfait!
Au Vietnam, les circuits en français ne sont pas aussi populaires que les circuits en anglais, mais au final nous avons trouvé une agence de voyage comme Hoian & Vicinity Tours. Ils servent les touristes en anglais et en français.
Au début, j'étais un peu sceptique quant à la capacité du guide à parler français, mais après d'avoir discuté un moment, j'ai été très surpris. Il parlait parfaitement le français comme un natif lorsqu'il nous a fourni des informations sur les destinations de notre itinéraire touristique dans la vieille ville de Hoi An. Nous avons appris beaucoup de choses intéressantes de lui. Il était très enthousiaste et n'hésitait pas à nous aider en cas de besoin.
La visite de trois jours et deux nuits à Hoi An et ses environs nous a offert une expérience formidable!
Nous sommes très reconnaissants à Hoian & Vicinity Tours d'avoir organisé une merveilleuse visite pour nous!
Si nous avons l'occasion de retourner à Hoi An, nous les verrons encore certainement. Nous aimons le beau pays du Vietnam!
Rank_of_province: Số 68 trên 127 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Hội An

Rank_of_province: Số 182 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Mountain Light Travel
Description:
Morgens früh wurde ich am Hotel abgeholt der Reiseleiter kam in die Lobby und brachte mich sicher über die Straße zum bus.
Mir wurde am Vorabend per Whatsapp mitgeteilt das man zwischen 8-8.20 Uhr zu mit kommen würde am Ende waren es 8.40 Uhr aber bei dem Verkehr kein Wunder.Der Bus war sehr komfortabel mit viel Beinfreiheit und USB Anschluss
Nachdem alle Leute abgeholt wurden fing unser Reiseleiter Hoan an zu reden und einen mit den wichtigsten Informationen zu informieren.
Die fahrt sollte ungefähr 3 Stunden dauern mit 2 pausen.Die erste Pause war eine Toiletten pause von 10 Minuten, die zweite eine Pause von einer halben Stunde auf einer Perlenfarm diese hat eine an eine Kaffefahrt erinnert aber immer hin war es interessant zu sehen wie so etwas hergestellt wird.
Als wir in Halong angekommen sind ging es auf das schiff mit zwei Etage unten Esszimmer oben Aussicht deck
An Board gab es dann 10 verschiedene Vietnamnesiche Gerichte mir wurde sogar extra was vegetarisches serviert.
Als erstes wurde the amazing cave besichtigt danach Tiptoe Island wo man sich aussuchen konnte ob man schwimmen möchte oder 400 Treppen hoch laufen möchte kann ich aber jedem nur empfehlen toller Ausblick danach ging es weiter zum Kajakfahren bzw bamboo boat trotz regen.
Nach einem anstrengenden tag ging es dann wieder 2 1/2 Stunden zurück mit kleiner essenspause
Ich war erst skeptische Weil es noch keine bewertungen auf TripAdvisor gab aber ich kann es jedem nur wärmstens ans Herz legen
Rank_of_province: Số 2 trên 7 Chuyến tham quan bằng thuyền & thể thao dưới nước ở Sapa

Title: GIALAI ECOTOURIST Co.,Ltd
Description: Chuyến 06 ngày của gia đình tôi thành công tốt đẹp, hdv chuyên nghiệp, dịch vụ tốt, hoàn hảo. Chuyến đi gắn kết tình thân các thành viên trong gia đình. Hdv chuyên nghiệp, lái xe rất tốt,khách sạn đẹp, ăn rất ngon
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 5 Chuyến tham quan & hoạt động ở Pleiku

Title: Vietnam Authentic Tours
Description:
Last week, I and my husband took Cai Rang Floating Market 1 day tour with Zara. She is such a friendly , super- informative and helpful tour guide that helped us a lots. She explained about Mekong Delta and showed us the nice vibes along the ways we travelled.

Before booking this tour, i considered much because i was afraid that we could not see much within 1 day but after the tour, we enjoyed it much. Save time, money and explore a lot.

Highly recommend you to book this tour when you expect to expect explore Mekong Delta!!
Rank_of_province: Số 74 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: vietvacationtours
Description: Vietnam and Cambodia from Australia. From the planning stage to the end of the trip, I had the most fabulous time. My guides were always prompt and very helpful, the destinations were wonderful, and the accommodation was perfect. My trip involved a significant amount of travelling throughout both countries, yet I never felt rushed or overly tired. I worked with Lily in planning the trip and her suggestions and recommendations were all outstanding. This was my first time in Cambodia and Vietnam and I would love to return. I highly recommend Vietvacationtours to anyone planning a trip to Southeast Asia.

Title: Halong Cruises 24h
Description: Serenity Cruises has make it of the best tours we have ever had in Northern Vietnam. Chris Tran is a charming tour guide and he knows a lot about the history and culture. We visited Halong, Lan Ha and Cat Ba but we learn so much about Vietnam, from why women wear cone hat but man don't, to the origin of spring rolls, to the mystery behind the super power of Vietnamese folks that help them join smoothly in a chaotic traffic. Highly recommended!!!

Title: Kha Tran Car Rental
Description:
The vehicles provided by agency are of good condition.
However the dealing lady was inappropriate in her behaviour.
1. She validated incorrect account details causing funds to reach incorrect account which later had to be reversed.
2. The requested vehicle was not available and they initially tried to give a much cheaper vehicle than the one booked. This was later rectified after 6 hours.
3. The driver misinformed dealing POC of the payment received and they spent 20 minutes yelling at me to give more payment
4. They put an Apple Tag to track the vehicle which will off course give you warning over your phone (if using iPhone)
Rank_of_province: Số 76 trên 215 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Nẵng

Title: Thao Driver Private Tours
Description: We booka trip with mr thao from hoi an to Hue. A Long the way e brought us to the marble Mountain where We Explorer the caves and pagodas, the hai van pass where he walked us through the look out towers, lap An lagoon and brought us to a delicious lunch mr thao speak english well, he very friendly and driver safe. His Car very comfortable with great air conditioning, car headrest, neck pillow, DVD Enterainment, cold water. We have very lucky to have service mr thảo and would gladly recommend him to friends. Thanks you mr thao!

Title: Hoi An Express Travel
Description:
Excellent show and service, accomodating, English-friendly. Would recommend to anyone trying to get the vibe of this beautiful city.

Most responsive on Facebook Messenger (search term Hoi An Express Travel).

Don't expect great food but this is a good cultural experience for the Perfume River, Royal experience, and experiencing Hue in a nutshell.
Rank_of_province: Số 42 trên 107 Phương tiện giao thông ở Huế

Title: Xin Chao Travel
Description: On arriving in Hanoi we had no arrangements for our 2 week tour of Vietnam. Thankfully we came across Christian who helped us not only with our days in Hanoi but arranged the majority of our transport around the whole of Vietnam, from trains, busses, boats and even hotels. Our transfers from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay, Nimh Bình and train to Da Nang were arranged perfectly, with even contact from Christian throughout our travels to ensure everything ran smoothly. His knowledge of his country is exceptional and I highly recommend any tour through this company!
Rank_of_province: Số 100 trên 224 Lớp học & hội thảo ở Hà Nội

Title: Saigon Private Car Limousine
Address: 302 Cong Hoa St,Tan Binh Dist,HCMC, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 700000 Việt Nam
Description:
Read DIY trip reviews online and decided to book a driver to save money. We arranged last minute with Thomas and a driver was provided at 9 am the next morning.
The driver was charming but flustered. Turns out his wife had just gone into labour. He drove us a few miles to meet a replacement. Zero adverse impact to us, all in all a great service and glad we took the chance. Great standard of driving and a nice car.
Rank_of_province: Số 82 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Private Car Transfer Hoi An
Description: I checked out Nhan through Google.. contacted him for Danang- Hoi An Private Trip. His FB and full name is Thien Nan Ho driving a Chevrolet Aveo Sedan ..very reliable, reasonable, caring and of course trustworthy. He can also communicate in basic English.Highly recommend for Danang trips. Please check if the name and number is correct Nhan( +84905725250)..they have similar names. As I missed my flight he arranged someone to pick us up to nearest hotel then next day came himself to send us back tough it's out of contract.
Rank_of_province: Số 86 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Hanoi Transfer Airport Service
Address: 16A Hàng Thùng Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội 100000 Việt Nam
Description:
From my initial contact onwards the communication with Lily from Hanoi Transfer Service was impeccable. Confirmation of my return booking was near instantaneous, online payment seamless and follow-up emails were immediately actioned.

Our return trip to the airport had to be adjusted when our booked flight was changed by the airline but an email sent after normal working hours was immediately answered and the pickup time adjusted. The car arrived at the hotel 5 minutes early and the transfer was stress free.

I cannot rate Lily‘s (therefore this company’s) customer service high enough!
Rank_of_province: Số 193 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: Sony Travel

Rank_of_province: Số 87 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Hoi An Pick Up
Description:
I arranged much of our transportation in Hoi An with Tim from Hoi An Pick Up. He was very responsive by email and I was able to negotiate a reasonable price for airport transfers to and from our hotel, and trips to Marble Mountain and BaNa Hills. He always checked in with me each day to reconfirm my activities and had no problem adjusting pick up time, etc as well as helping us go through an expedited line to get our tickets at BaNa Hills.
Our driver was Hoang who was always punctual and very nice and accommodating. He was one of the safest drivers I observed on the road and we felt very comfortable in his care. He was also very flexible- one day we needed him to drop my daughter and I off at the tailors after he dropped off the rest of our family at the hotel. He had no problem and offered to pick us up again later. Highly recommend this service!
Rank_of_province: Số 88 trên 187 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hội An

Title: Victory Cruises
Description: Had a fabulous 2 night/3day cruise on Halong Bay as part of a Mercury Vietnam Odyssey trip. Loved our cabin which was spacious enough for the trip. Very clean & most areas seemed to be well maintained. We had no issues. Middle deck had dining room and upper deck was for chilling. Sunbathing on the deck & nice drinks up there in the evening. Drinks were a wee bit pricey we thought. Food was amazing & beautifully presented & service professional. Lots of fish/seafood, but non fish people were well catered for too. Scenery was spectacular and the trips out in the tender were enjoyable. There was even night fishing. This cruise was one of the highlights of the whole trip. Thoroughly recommend.

Title: Hoi An Express Travel
Description: Cette île est bétonnée d'immeubles un peu partout le long des plages.de grands hôtels de 300 chambres sur des terrains immense. Nous n'avons pas la possibilité d'aller sur les plages.du côté de duong dong,les hôtels les uns à la suite des autres ont leurs plages privées gardées avec des transats.il y a aussi quelques bars où tu es obligé de consommer pour t'installer sur la plage. Cette île est aussi très chère. Il reste un peu de forêt dans le Nord et quelques belles plages qu'il faut chercher mais certaines sont pleines de déchets. En ce qui concerne le snorkeling, rien à voir, les coraux sont morts, les touristes arrivent par centaines, amenés par de gros bateaux (john 's tour) et ils les piétine avec joie. Pour ceux qui aiment la nature, je pense que ce n'est pas pour eux. Par contre ceux qui aiment la plage tout confort et les restaurants occidentaux c'est parfait.
Rank_of_province: S? 26 trên 54 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? ?a?o Phu? Quô?c

Title: Hue Car transfers & Tours
Description:
Reservamos un tour por la ciudad de Hue con esta empresa. Son muy profesionales, contestando a todas mis dudas e intentando buscar la satisfacción del cliente. Los coches son muy nuevos y cómodos. Pedimos un guía en español y aunque intentaron encontrarlo como solo avisamos con un día de antelación no pudieron encontrar uno pero no fue un problema.
Nuestro conductor Anh fue muy atento y nos dejó el tiempo que necesitamos para visitar cada monumento, además conducía con mucha precaución. Todos los sitios que visitamos merecían la pena, lo único que no nos gustó fue el paseo por el río en una barca un poco vieja.

El día siguiente hicimos un viaje con el mismo conductor de Hue a Hoi An parando en Lang Co Beach, Hai Van Pass y las montañas de mármol.
Una buena experiencia con esta empresa.

Title: S?n Nguyên Limousine
Description: Reading reviews this company definitely has hits and misses. Before travelling with them we had recommended them to another couple - hit. They had no problem. Service was excellent. We used their service yesterday. Definitely a miss. Was the scariest ride ever. The 'limousine' a Ford transit van style with 9 seats, shook and rattled once it reached any speed over 50kph. The fact the driver seemed to be Fangio on steroids made this the scariest white knuckle ride we have ever been on. I feel really sad in saying this, because I wanted it to work. We were so upset by the ride we were happy to forfeit the prepaid return fare and take the Futa bus back to Ho Chi Minh - more relaxed, (strangely less time!) and much much safer

What I couldn't accept was that the Sapaly staff was unfriendly. Usually, unfriendly service is due to the staff being unable to use English, but I found that I was being ignored when I asked for a stool so I could help elderly members of my group board the train.
If you have elderly people with you, don't take the train. Take the road coach instead.

This ride should only cost 50.000 vnd!!!

Please be aware of the conmen and later on today, discovered THE GRAB APP, the most amazing taxi and service App I have ever tried.

Enjoy Hanoi

Title: Taxi N?i Bài
Description: I am not sure about the company associated with the taxies who made us feel uncomfortable, but Hanoi and in a greater scale the whole Vietnam has lots of dishonest and canning taxi drivers. We were overcharged 3 times. As a frequent traveller who has visited 26 countries in the world at age 34, such attitude was completely unacceptable. One of them had manipulated the taximeter and asked us an unbelievably high amount for taxi fare, and when we objected and resisted, he took my friend's hand not letting her get out of his damn car!We were scared, shocked and stressed. I took a photo from cars numberplate and went to police station to report it but they didn't help us. I was profoundly disappointed. Considering that the city doesn't have much to tour, I highly suggest you: forget about Hanoi and try Much more beautiful cities in Thailands and Indonasia.

Title: Xe Quân B?u
Description:
My wife and I traveled from Ha Tiên to Can Tho using this bus service. We didn’t have much choice because you’re at the whim of whatever bus is departing from the bus station.

The price of the bus is listed in the station at $6/person. But the scam starts when the station refuses to accept payment and instead redirects you to the bus driver to be paid directly.

The bus driver’s price is $10/person.

They know your only option is to pay their price or walk away.

We walked away.

Then while we were sorting out our plans at a nearby roadside cafe, the same bus stops by us on its way to Can Tho and solicits a discount to $2/person.

We agree and hop on.

Then mid way through the trip, the bus assistant comes around asking for money, but then asks us to pay the original marked up price of $10/person.

They know your only options are to pay the price of their scam or step off the bus in the middle of nowhere.

However, with the help of Google Translate (make sure you’ve download Vietnamese beforehand) and the help of other local passengers we agree on the regular fare of $6/person.

On one occasion while we were arguing with the bus assistant on the agreed upon price he made an aggressive hand gesture towards me that he was going to punch me. While nothing happened, they continued to use bully tactics to intimidate us even more.

I’d avoid this bus service if possible or find a way to keep them accountable of the price agreed. Or better yet, organise travel ahead of time.
Rank_of_province: S? 9 trên 16 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Câ?n Th?

Title: Ga Nha Trang
Description: If there is no star in this review I will choose it. My husband booked this train from Nha Trang to HCMC. He thought it would be nice to see the view,nature on the train. It’s 8 hours ride and it was the longest 8 hours of my life!!!! It’s horrible, terrible, awful experience. We saw the photos online for clean, nice looking soft seat so we booked it. I didn’t expect much but this was way worse than I thought. It’s dirty and smelly. I’m writing this review when it was 7 hours more to go. I hope I don’t have to go to the toilet. I will not eat I will not drink because I can’t imagine what’s a toilet situation is going to be :((
Rank_of_province: S? 21 trên 58 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Nha Trang

Title: Hieu Motorbike and Jeep Tours
Description: Wir haben die Sanddunes Tour vom Hostel aus gebucht. Am Hostel wurden wir mit einem sehr alten Jeep abgeholt und mussten uns zu acht da irgendwie rein quetschen. Nach dem Fairy Stream wurden wir zu den White Sanddunes gefahren. Dort wurde uns gesagt, wir sind spät dran und wenn wir den Sonnenuntergang noch sehen möchten, müssen wir mit einem Quad dorthin fahren. Wir mussten 200.000 Dong pro Person dafür bezahlen, dass man uns da hin fährt. Wenn wir alleine mit dem Quad hätten fahren wollen, hätten wir 800.000 Dong hinblättern müssen. Die Quadfahrt hat mehr gekostet als die Tour insgesamt. Am nächsten haben sich Hostelgäste beschwert, die die Tour für morgens gebucht hatten um den Sonnenaufgang zu sehen. Denen wurde auch erzählt sie wären zu spät dran. Vielleicht ist das die Masche um den Touristen Geld aus den Rippen zu leihern. Besagte Gäste die sich beschwert hatten, wurden am selben Tag dem Hostel verwiesen.
Rank_of_province: S? 11 trên 23 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Phan Thiê?t

Title: ADT Transportation
Description: , i used this company to travel from hcm to mui ne FEB 2020 , 9 seat vip bus , trip was fine but when we arrived in mui ne driver said that my hotel was located down a narrow road and that i would have to walk with all my bags down this road , the bus stopped and i got out to take a look , the road was only wide enough for 1 car but easily wide enough for the driver TO DRIVE DOWN THIS NARROW ROAD to drop me at hotel , please bear in mind that this is supposed to be a VIP bus , i told the driver that i wanted to be taken to the hotel in the bus but the driver refused , he said he WILL NOT drive down this road , then another man arrived on a motorbike and started shouting at me telling me that the road was not wide enough !!! what a joke , ive been driving all my life and i know if a road is wide enough or not , during my 5 night stay at the hotel i witnessed 6 vip buses stop RIGHT OUTSIDE my hotel and these buses obviously DID drive down this road , the road actually widened as you drove down it and to make matters worse there was a 'T' junction just past my hotel to make it easy for the bus to turn around , a number of cars were using this road every day and yet my driver ( if u can call him a driver ) flat refused to take me to hotel ..............such a terrbile , terrible service , PLEASE DO NOT BOOK VIP BUS WITH THIS HORRIBLE HORRIBLE COMPANY , SEE THE ATTACHED PICTURES

The "paid" status in my personal account on the Vexere app was not enough and I was taken to the control room where another ticket was manually issued after 15 min of discussion. But that was not the end of my misfortunes. It turned out that there were people sleeping in the aisle on the floor at night and the toilet was not working. The driver offered me to stop the bus and go to the bushes instead of the toilet! That's the kind of comfort for 650 dong for a VIP bus! I will never take this bus again and I will not recommend it to anyone.

Title: Xe Transfer Service
Description:
We used this service from Sapa to Hanoi. The driver rode very dangerously and went very fast down the winding roads from Sapa - one women was very sick and he didn't stop when first asked. He may have no English but I think it was clear that we needed to stop. We finally stopped when she vomited and she was very unwell.'
On the free way he approached every vechile at speed and ready to over take before checking it was safe and often on double lines. He had no ability to wait or be cautious. We had a number of near misses when over taking. Unfortunately the road toll is terrible in Vietnam so the drivers need to be cautious and mature in their attitude. We did have some safer drivers but also a few other unpleasant experiences. be careful who you choose and if possible have a driver who speaks English

Title: Green Path Airport Transfers
Description:
I was recommended this company for a transfer in Hanoi by a friend who had used them. The booking process was fine, however my transfer never showed up. I proceeded to call the companies phone number but no answer. I then tried their emergency phone number - which wasn't even connected!!
After already paying for the service you would expect it to turn up. I did get a refund, but still no explanation as to why no one showed.
Definitely would not recommend this company.
Get in contact with your hotel to arrange a driver for you if visiting Hanoi, they will be more than happy to collect you and for half the price of what the transfer companies offer!

Title: Saigon Mui Ne Transfer
Address: HQC Plaza, Nguyen Van Linh str, An Phu Tay, Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam, Thành ph? H? Chí Minh 700000 Vi?t Nam
Description: I booked a transfer from Can Tho to HCMC. The driver arrived at our hotel but had no details of our name. The hotel was reluctant for us to get in the car. The drivers name and vehicle registration were different to what we were given by this company. It took 15 minutes to verify that the driver “changed the vehicle without telling the company”. He could not even tell us the company name. This should have rung alarm bells. The car was dirty on the outside. DONT BELIEVE THE PHOTOS OF VEHICLES ON THE WEBSITE. After about an hour the driver showed signs of tiredness as he was drifting into other lanes. Scary. so I used my translate app and asked if the driver could stop for a break. He did. At the toll stops! He put water on his face to wake up. He stopped another 3 times - once to get more water. For himself only. We sat in that cramped car for 4 hours. No water was given to us (the first vehicle in Vietnam to do this). No restroom breaks. And no lunch break. We were watching him the whole time to make sure he didn’t fall asleep. A MOST DANGEROUS DRIVER, UNPROFESSIONAL, NO DUTY OF CARE. Do not book this company if you value your life. And we paid 2,500,000VND for this. Absolutely disgusting.
Rank_of_province: S? 130 trên 273 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Thành ph? H? Chí Minh

Title: Sapa Limousine Bus
Description:
Our family of 5’s return trip from Ha Noi to Sapa in a luxury 9 seater was the worst I’d experienced. The driver ( name was Kiet or Ken ) was so rude. No greetings on both trip. We got into the car, my mum and daughter sat in the front two seats. He told them to sit in the next row as the front row was reserved, and the remaining 3 of us sat in the last row. He drove too fast and dangerously. We asked him to slow down and he snapped back advising that he had a time limit and had to be in Sapa at 2:30pm. I said “better to slow down and arrive in one piece”. He said if I wasn’t happy, I should call the office and complain. I didn’t bother, instead he called and complained to the office about us requesting to reduce the speed. He served in and out from lanes, passing cars and trucks. He was driving as if he was in Fast & Dangerous. When we got to Sapa at 1:30pm the centre was covered in cloud and fog. He dropped us in front of the church and told us to walk 300m to our hotel. Couldn’t see where we were going and did not know the direction of the hotel. We asked the little Hmong children to show us. We arrived at the hotel which can be accessed by car. He made us walk with all our luggages in tow!!
We prayed on our return we didn’t have him, BUT WE DID. No greetings from him ( grumpy face), and again told us to sit in the seats how we came. He told me that the front seats are $400,00 VND. I told him the hotel booked us the transport and we paid $1,400,000 VND each. He said “ I don’t care “. He told us we couldn’t eat because we left rubbish behind at the last trip. I told him we took our rubbish with us and we did not eat the food that he said was left in the car. That shut him up. I told him that other companies let their passengers eat in the car why not this company. Once again he told me to call the office, and once again he called the office and complained about our family. We had 5 Vietnamese bread rolls made for us from our Hotel however we couldn’t eat it. The ride back to Hanoi was rough. 3/7 people vomited due to his rough driving. He even dropped by somewhere and picked up his wife and child to visit his mother. They were talking so loudly. I complained to the hotel who made the booking and they were so apologetic. They called the transport company and I spoke to a lady by the name of Thuy (Twee). She listened to my feed back and said she will follow up. The chat with Thuy eased my frustration, howeverI will not be using them in future.
Rank_of_province: S? 268 trên 494 Ph??ng tiê?n giao thông ? Hà N?i

Description: Taxi mùa dịch 24/7. Cho đến lúc gọi đặt xe trước 2 giờ thì được tổng đài kêu 1 giờ sau gọi lại. Và … boom. Hết xe để điều đến nơi đón khách. Làm trễ cả 1 chuyến bay.
Rank_of_province: Số 134 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: SaigonAir Taxi
Description: Firstly I will say we did actually arrive at our hotel. That said the ride was one of the worst experiences I have had in Vietnam. It started off with a guy in a suit directed us from the taxi line to the Siagon Air Taxi, seems legit, get in and the driver is happy to take us to our location. Drives about 1km stops says you pay 200k for trip upfront. I say no meter price only. The trip continues with the driver mashing the gas and brake so that I feel like I'm in a washing machine. It was late at night and very little traffic. The driver was constantly talking on her phone travelling awfully slow and stopping in the middle of the road. Very nerve racking. We did arrive safe and it cost 150k. Never using this company again.
Rank_of_province: Số 133 trên 273 Phương tiện giao thông ở Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh

Title: Phuc Xuyen
Description: Wow. We booked from Sapa to Halong Bay not expecting luxury but this fell far below any standards we had set. Pretty sure this is the only direct service between sapa and Halong but I wish there was another. The seats are tiny with no space for bags or shoes - almost no chance of sleeping. To add to this the bus stops about every 10 minutes to pick up and drop off parcels. The bus also drives without stopping for a loo break for 5 hours, and if you go by the side of the road whilst they're dropping off parcels they are rude and constantly hurrying you (almost left my girlfriend behind). As the journey went on more people got on - to the point that we had people sitting on the floor. The driver drives like he's blackout drunk which makes for a dicey experience to say the least. We had one stop at lunch and it was only for 10 minutes, during most of that time I was recovering from the past 5 hours and not eating. If this review gets to anyone, please save yourselves and don't use this service.
Rank_of_province: Số 1 trên 2 Phương tiện giao thông ở Uong Bi

Title: Limousine Tràng An
Description:
The driver was unbelievably rude, pushy and impatient. I lost track of the number of times he smacked into me on the bus while dropping off and collecting other passangers. He spent a considerable amount of time shouting at someone on his mobile phone (is this legal in VN?) and subsequently it was quite a stressful journey.

The seats were actually quite comfortable. But the way the driver conducted himself was like a playground bully.

Avoid this company at all costs.

Title: Ket Doan Bus
Description:
This is the most unorganized booking I’ve ever experienced. From start to finish these guys don’t know what they are doing. That mixed with the rudest personnel is a cocktail made in hell.
So we arrive at the ken doan offices where we show the ticket to the lady behind the counter. She tells us okay and to take a seat before the bus comes. She leaves the front desk and for the next 30 minutes she is disappeared. More and more travelers show up, and is waiting patiently. We do not know what is happening nor do we know what the time plan is. She eventually return, from what appears to be a nice long shower.
We’re told that our driver will pick us up in five minutes, and that turns out to be somewhat true. A guy on a motorbike comes in to the office screaming at the lady behind the counter, all while rushing us and the other passengers into a taxi to take us to the bus.
When we arrive at the bus, we receive our ticket. Turns out that the two cabins we booked has turned into a “double cabin”. With confusion I am told that this is what we booked, and that it’s no problem. At least not to them. I insist that this is not true but only to be met by the personnel getting more hostile towards us.
So because of their overbooking, my wife and I share one cabin that would normally fit a person under 160 cm.
I honestly think no one should ever give these guys business. They are not scammers, just incredibly rude and unorganized.
Cross posting this to other platforms to spread awareness of this disaster of a travel agency.
Rank_of_province: Số 18 trên 24 Phương tiện giao thông ở Cát Bà

Title: Hà Sơn Hải Vân
Description:
DO NOT USE this terrible company! We booked the bus through our hostel in Sapa, going from there to Noi Bai airport.

Firstly, the driver’s assistant was instantly aggressive and pushed my girlfriend on the way down to our seats when we boarded, and that was just the start of it.

As we were getting off, the driver slapped her in the leg when she was getting off the bus because she put on her shoes before we stepped out into their waterlogged carpark, hitting her caused her to slip and fall going out the door.

Note that he didn’t do any such thing with me or our other male friend, even when I confronted him, it seems they only get physical with women.

Bus was overpriced, another member of staff at their office told me they’d file a complaint over the driver, I doubt it but hopefully this will persuade you not to use this company under ANY circumstances!
Rank_of_province: Số 279 trên 494 Phương tiện giao thông ở Hà Nội

Title: An Phu Travel
Description:
Terrible, terrible, terrible. The reviews on Bookaway didn’t sound too bad but we should have checked on here first. We booked Quy Nhon to Da Lat, arrived at the pickup point at the Go! Mall more than 45 minutes early, and then there was no sign of the bus anywhere for more than 2.5 hours. We were meant to depart at midnight, so we eventually had to give up and check in to a hotel nearby to the pick up location. The buses themselves not being up to Western standards I can live with just fine. What I find egregious is (going off my experience and clearly many others’ on here) the cavalier attitude to customer service and simply failing to pick up a passenger when and where they are meant to be picked up. Seriously how hard is it to either be in the right place at the right time or at least inform someone if they are many hours late so you aren’t just sat wondering whether it will ever show up. Why on earth would they take a contact number upon booking if not to get the bus driver to use it if they can’t find the passengers at the pickup location? Equally why if the buses run 24/7, why is there no 24/7 contact telephone number in case scenarios just like this happen?

Furious. Don’t bother with this piece of dog s*** company
Rank_of_province: Số 14 trên 24 Phương tiện giao thông ở Đà Lạt

Title: Ông
Description:
I recently had a ticket with your airline and needed to change the travel date. Following the instructions on your website, I proceeded to make the necessary changes online, for which I was charged $165.

To my dismay, after just an hour, I received an email from your company stating that my request for a date change had been rejected, citing an exorbitant changing fee of $1300. This sudden change in the fee is not only unreasonable but also completely unacceptable. I trusted the price offered by your website and made the necessary arrangements accordingly.

Furthermore, I have had to engage in multiple conversations through your customer service chat, which has proven to be an incredibly frustrating and time-consuming experience. The representatives I interacted with displayed a lack of professionalism and were consistently rude. This kind of behavior is not what I expect from a reputable company, and it has left me feeling extremely dissatisfied.
Rank_of_province: Số 28 trên 58 Phương tiện giao thông ở Nha Trang
